original: I looked and saw that I had killed it in one blow. In that moment, I realized that my becoming a Desert Ranger wasn't a fluke.
translation: 我一看，发现我一下子就把它打死了。在那一刻，我意识到我成为一名沙漠游骑兵并不是侥幸。

original: That's when I truly earned that armor.
translation: 那才是我真正获得那件盔甲的瞬间。

original: Four years is a pretty long time. What changed?
translation: 四年是相当长的一段时间。发生了什么变化？

original: Alright. Leave and don't come back.
translation: 好吧。走吧，别再回来了。

original: Understood.
translation: 明白。

original: You clearly can't be saved.
translation: 你显然已经没救了。

original: The Legion has some good qualities.
translation: 军团有一些好的品质。

original: So am I.
translation: 我也是。

original: <Attack.> I'm tired of this shit.
translation: <攻击>我受够了。

original: Sure.
translation: 当然。

original: I have other questions about the Rangers.
translation: 我还有其他关于游骑兵的问题。

original: Well, I hope you've satisifed it. Leave this cave while you can.
translation: 好吧，我希望你已经满意了。趁早离开这个山洞。

original: Just curious.
translation: 只是有点好奇。

original: I'll have to stop that from happening.
translation: 我必须阻止这种事发生。

original: I'm here to serve the Legion.
translation: 我是来为军团服务的。

original: I kill bootlickers like you, and I'm going to.
translation: 我要杀了你这样的马屁精，我一定会的。

original: I'm convinced he has it right.
translation: 我相信他是对的。

original: You clearly can't be saved.
translation: 你显然已经没救了。

original: He made some good points.
translation: 他提出了一些很好的观点。

original: Obviously. It's good to know that you understand that. You can leave.
translation: 显然，很高兴你能理解这一点。你可以走了。

original: He was talking out of his ass.
translation: 他是在胡说八道。

original: If you're smart enough to get one over on Caesar, I guess you can stick around. Stay away from the gated section. I've rigged it with traps.
translation: 如果你够聪明，能骗过凯撒，我想你可以留下来。远离门控区域，我装了陷阱。

original: He thinks I did.
translation: 他认为我是。

original: I don't tolerate bootlickers.
translation: 我不能容忍马屁精。

original: Yeah, I did.
translation: 搞定。

original: I don't know why you're lying about that. I'll let you leave, though. Run along now.
translation: 我不知道你为什么要撒谎，不过我会让你离开的。快走吧。

original: <Lie.> Yes.
translation: <说谎>是的。

original: I don't tolerate bootlickers.
translation: 我不能容忍马屁精。

original: <Lie.> No.
translation: <说谎>不。

original: My patience has run out.
translation: 我的耐心已经耗尽了。

original: <Lie.> Nothing important.
translation: <说谎>没有什么重要的。

original: Okay. So, what specifically did you want to know?
translation: 好吧。那么，你具体想知道什么？

original: I do have questions.
translation: 我确实有问题。

original: Then why did you ask?
translation: 那你为什么要问？

original: Better not, then.
translation: 那还是算了吧。

original: Got tired of me talking your ear off, I see.
translation: 看来是受够了我的喋喋不休。

original: That's enough about the Rangers.
translation: 游骑兵的事到此为止。

original: A Ranger never stops fighting until he runs out of ammo. When he runs out of ammo, he uses his fists.
translation: 游骑兵永远不会停止战斗，直到他的弹药耗尽。当子弹耗尽时，他会使用拳头。

original: When his fists are broken, he uses his teeth. When his teeth are broken, he's dead.
translation: 当他的拳头折断时，他会用牙齿。当他的牙齿折断时，他就死了。

original: Rangers don't stop fighting ever.
translation: 游骑兵从不停止战斗。

original: Can I convince you to stop?
translation: 我能说服你停手吗？

original: In Arizona, having such an idiotic stance would have gotten you killed by the age of ten. I don't have time for this. Get the fuck out.
translation: 在亚利桑那，这样愚蠢的立场会让你在十岁之前就被杀。我没时间跟你废话，滚出去。

original: If you kill them, you're just as bad as them.
translation: 如果你杀了他们，你就和他们一样坏了。

original: That's for the best.
translation: 这样最好不过了。

original: I guess I have other questions, then.
translation: 那我还有别的问题要问。

original: It should.
translation: 应该如此。

original: Makes sense to me.
translation: 我觉得可以。

original: Every real Ranger does.
translation: 每个真正的游骑兵都是这样。

original: Do you believe that?
translation: 你相信吗？

original: You don't, because you're not a Ranger.
translation: 你不明白，因为你不是游骑兵。

original: I see.
translation: 我明白了。

original: Of course it does.
translation: 当然有。

original: I guess that makes sense.
translation: 我想这很合理。

original: It's a wonderful place, isn't it? If magic exists, it's there.  Miles of untouched wilderness, honest-to-God rain and herds of wild animals.
translation: 那是个很棒的地方，对吧？如果魔法存在，它就在那里。绵延数英里的原生态荒野，令人敬畏的雨水和成群的野生动物。

original: I've been to Utah before.
translation: 我以前去过犹他州。

original: Maybe. I was amazed at the time, but the stories I heard from the other Rangers.... They're even more amazing.
translation: 也许吧。我当时很惊讶，但是我从其他游骑兵那里听到的故事....它们更神奇。

original: That's amazing.
translation: 非常神奇。

original: Lots of things are unbelievable. That's why the wasteland is such a wonderful place. Whether a legend is real or not isn't the point.
translation: 很多事情都是难以置信的，这就是为什么废土是一个如此美妙的地方。传说是真是假并不是重点。

original: The last person I told this story to missed the point, too.
translation: 上一个听我讲这个故事的人也没有抓住重点。

original: Is that true? It sounds unbelievable to me.
translation: 是真的吗？这听起来让我难以置信。

original: I don't know if that's possible without being a Ranger, but I think you're as close as you can get.
translation: 我不知道如果不当游骑兵还能不能做到，但我觉得你已经很接近了。

original: I think I get the point of this story.
translation: 我想我明白这个故事的意思了。

original: Probably not. But, it's not meant to be impressive. It's meant to make a point.
translation: 可能没有。但是，这并不是为了给人留下深刻印象，这是为了表明一个观点。

original: It's not that impressive.
translation: 没那么令人印象深刻。

original: This is Arizona. You're walking in a land full of legends. You're nothing special. Neither am I.
translation: 这里是亚利桑那，你行走在一片充满传奇的土地上。你没什么特别的，我也没有。

original: You can't become a legend until you're gone from this earth, anyways. And then it's up to who's left. Not me. Not you.
translation: 不管怎样，在你离开这个世界之前，你是不可能成为一个传奇的。然后就看剩下谁了，不是我，不是你。

original: Remember that.
translation: 记住这一点。

original: I'm something of a legend, too.
translation: 我也是个传奇人物。

original: A mercenary. I have distaste for them.
translation: 雇佣兵，我讨厌他们。

original: I'm looking for work.
translation: 我在找工作。

original: No, I do. Presently, my orders are to mobilize the maximum amount of manpower before our march on Hoover Dam.
translation: 不，我有。现在，我的任务是在向胡佛水坝进军前调动最大限度的人力。

original: As such, I am in need of a bounty hunter to avoid stretching ourselves too thin. Are you interested?
translation: 因此，我需要一个赏金猎人来避免我们累垮。你有兴趣吗？

original: Does that mean you don't have work?
translation: 这是否意味着你没有工作？

original: Are you interested now?
translation: 你现在感兴趣了？

original: I'd like to ask about bounties.
translation: 我想问一下悬赏的事。

original: Which ones?
translation: 哪一个？

original: I have questions about my bounties.
translation: 我对悬赏有疑问。

original: I was born into the Fingers del Mesa tribe in southern Arizona and taken as a slave by the Legion.
translation: 我出生在亚利桑那州南部的芬格·德尔·梅萨部落，被军团当作奴隶。

original: After years of training, hard work and discipline, I was elevated to the coveted rank of Recruit Legionary.
translation: 经过多年的训练、辛勤的工作和严格的纪律，我被提升到令人垂涎的军团新兵。

original: I served dutifully in every campaign in Arizona from Malpais onwards, including the civilization of my former tribe.
translation: 从马尔帕斯开始，我在亚利桑那州的每一场战役中都尽职尽责，包括面对我以前部落的文明。

original: By 2265, I was recognized as a Veteran Decanus.
translation: 到2265年，我被认定为一名老兵什长。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: I have answers.
translation: 我有答案。

original: I have questions.
translation: 我有问题。

original: My tribe was degenerate in culture, spirit and tongue.
translation: 我的部落在文化、精神和语言上都很堕落。

original: It was not until I was forced to confront my own lack of discipline that I understood the level of my depravity.
translation: 直到我被迫面对自己的缺乏自律，我才明白自己堕落到什么程度。

original: The Legion is a liberating force, who allows man to flourish in the way he was meant to. The Legion liberates us from ourselves.
translation: 军团是一种解放的力量，它允许人类以其应有的方式蓬勃发展。军团将我们从自我中解放出来。

original: Doesn't it bother you that you slaughtered your own tribe?
translation: 你屠杀了自己的部落，难道不觉得困扰吗？

original: Which one?
translation: 哪一个？

original: I'd like to claim a bounty.
translation: 我想要领取赏金。

original: What would you like to know?
translation: 你想知道些什么？

original: Tell me about Malpais.
translation: 跟我说说马尔帕斯。

original: What do you wish to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: Tell me about the commanders on this front.
translation: 跟我说说前线的指挥官。

original: It is the uniform of an Optio. Ah, I don't believe we have any posted on the other side of the river in this theater.
translation: 这是执行官的制服。啊，我不相信我们在河对岸的战区里有这个职位。

original: An Optio is the second-in-command to a Centurion.
translation: 执行官是百夫长之后的二把手。

original: What is that uniform you're wearing?
translation: 你穿的是什么制服？

original: What do wish to know?
translation: 你想知道什么？

original: Tell me about Optios.
translation: 跟我说说执行官。

original: Optios are tasked with providing logistical, intelligence and administrative support to Centurions.
translation: 执行官的任务是为百夫长提供后勤、情报和行政支持。

original: They also move information around between Centurions in the midst of battle to help coordinate offensives.
translation: 他们还在战斗中在百夫长之间传递信息，以帮助协调进攻。

original: What are the duties of an Optio?
translation: 执行官的职责是什么？

original: There are no Centurions in Malpais. I represent the Centurions that are assembling at the Castra Legatus.
translation: 马尔帕斯没有百夫长。我代表正在特使军营集会的百夫长。

original: They have continuous demands for supplies, which I pass on to Marcellus Sedonus.
translation: 他们对物资有持续不断的需求，我把这些交给了马塞卢斯·塞多尼乌斯。

original: What Centurion are you representing here?
translation: 你代表的是哪个百夫长？

original: Aurelius of Phoenix was supposed to have an Optio, but he took a shot from snipers at Camp Willow and died of his wounds.
translation: 凤凰城的奥勒留本应该有一个执行官，但他在柳树营地中了狙击手的一枪，伤重不治。

original: Aurelius then informed us that he didn't need one.
translation: 然后奥勒留告诉我们他不需要。

original: Why don't the Centurions on the other side of the river have Optios?
translation: 为什么河对岸的百夫长没有执行官？

original: Aurelius of Phoenix was supposed to have an Optio, but he took a shot from snipers at Camp Willow and died of his wounds.
translation: 凤凰城的奥勒留本应该有一个执行官，但他在柳树营地中了狙击手的一枪，伤重不治。

original: It's a moot point now that he is dead.
translation: 既然他已经死了，那就没有意义了。

original: Why don't the Centurions on the other side of the river have Optios?
translation: 为什么河对岸的百夫长没有执行官？

original: I'll assume that you mean Marcellus Sedonus and not the previous one. Sedonus is a competent and able commander.
translation: 我猜你指的是马塞卢斯·塞多尼乌斯而不是前一位。塞多尼乌斯是个能干的指挥官。

original: He is skilled in administration, and has a truly awe-inspiring record of service in the name of Caesar.
translation: 他善于管理，在凯撒的名义下，有一个真正令人敬畏的服务记录。

original: What do you think of the Malpais Legate?
translation: 你觉得马尔帕斯特使怎么样？

original: He is the new legate of Malpais following the fall of the Burned Man. He is a competent commander and administrator.
translation: 他是火烧人死后马尔帕斯的新特使，他是一位称职的指挥官和管理者。

original: He is skilled in administration, and has a truly awe-inspiring record of service in the name of Caesar.
translation: 他善于管理，在凯撒的名义下，有一个真正令人敬畏的服务记录。

original: Tell me about Marcellus Sedonus.
translation: 跟我说说马塞卢斯·塞多尼乌斯。

original: Caesar gave him this post to help him come to terms with his age.
translation: 凯撒给他这个职位是为了帮助他适应自己的年龄。

original: His experience is best served in these types of posts rather than in the heat of battle.
translation: 他的经验最好用于这些类型的职位，而不是在激烈的战斗中。

original: He seeks a noble death. I fear he is under the impression that he needs to die in battle to complete his service to the Legion.
translation: 他寻求高尚的死亡，我担心他认为只有在战斗中牺牲才能完成对军团的服务。

original: This is an administrative position. What is he doing here instead of the front?
translation: 这是一个行政职位。他为什么在这里而不是在前面？

original: Ah, the Legate. Legatus Lanius is a mighty warrior.  He was the sole survivor of a Legion attack on his tribe.
translation: 啊，特使，拉尼厄斯特使是一个强大的战士。他是军团袭击他的部落时唯一的幸存者。

original: He rose as a slave through the ranks of the Legion military after stopping an attempt on Caesar's life.
translation: 在阻止了一次刺杀凯撒的行动后，他以奴隶身份在军团中晋升。

original: Caesar allowed him to prove himself in the field of battle.
translation: 凯撒允许他在战场上证明自己。

original: Tell me about Legate Lanius.
translation: 跟我说说拉尼厄斯特使。

original: Ah, the Legate. Legatus Lanius is a mighty warrior.  He was the sole survivor of a Legion attack on his tribe.
translation: 啊，特使，拉尼厄斯特使是一个强大的战士。他是军团袭击他的部落时唯一的幸存者。

original: He rose as a slave through the ranks of the Legion military after stopping an attempt on Caesar's life.
translation: 在阻止了一次刺杀凯撒的行动后，他以奴隶身份在军团中晋升。

original: Caesar allowed him to prove himself in the field of battle.
translation: 凯撒允许他在战场上证明自己。

original: Tell me about Legate Lanius.
translation: 跟我说说拉尼厄斯特使。

original: He was once a trusted ally of Caesar and helped unite Arizona under his rule.
translation: 他曾是凯撒信任的盟友，帮助凯撒统一了亚利桑那州。

original: However, during the first battle at Hoover Dam, he foolishly walked into a trap laid by the Rangers.
translation: 然而，在胡佛水坝的第一次战役中，他愚蠢地走进了游骑兵设下的陷阱。

original: The NCR obliterated an entire town to stop the Legion and used sharpshooters to pick off our leaders.
translation: NCR为了阻止军团，摧毁了整个城镇，用神枪手射杀了我们的领袖。

original: This resulted in a rout, but the NCR was apparently unable or unwilling to follow up their victory, a grave mistake that we will exploit.
translation: 这导致了一场溃败，但NCR显然无法或不愿继续他们的胜利，我们将利用这一严重的错误。

original: Tell me about the Burned Man.
translation: 跟我谈谈浴火者。

original: Malpais is the logistics hub of the Legion in this theater of the war with the NCR. It provides supplies to The Fort and the Castra Legatus.
translation: 马尔帕斯是军团在这个战场上与NCR作战的后勤中心，它为堡垒和特使军营提供补给。

original: It also possesses a gold mine for the production of currency, which will need to be utilized to fund the greater war against the NCR.
translation: 它还拥有一个用于生产货币的金矿，这些货币将被用于资助对抗NCR的更大战争。

original: What is the purpose of Malpais?
translation: 马尔帕斯的目的是什么？

original: No. Malpais is far from the frontlines. The only trades we shot are between NCR snipers from Camp Forlorn Hope.
translation: 不，马尔帕斯离前线很远。我们唯一需要对付的是在飘零希望营地的NCR狙击手。

original: Does Malpais see much combat?
translation: 马尔帕斯有很多战斗吗？

original: Not since Camp Forlorn Hope fell. NCR snipers no longer threaten us.
translation: 自从飘零希望营地陷落后就没有了，NCR的狙击手不再威胁我们了。

original: Does Malpais see much combat?
translation: 马尔帕斯有很多战斗吗？

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: That's enough about Malpais.
translation: 关于马尔佩斯就说到这里。

original: He is my suboptio and is posted in the town of Solitare. He is a skilled and able commander.
translation: 他是我的副手，被派驻在索利泰尔镇。他是一个有经验、有能力的指挥官。

original: Often times, my duties at both here at the Castra Legatus keep me busy enough that I required to delegate work to him.
translation: 很多时候，我在特使军营的工作让我很忙，我需要把工作委托给他。

original: I believe that he will be elevated to rank of Centurion before the end of next year. He has certainly earned it.
translation: 我相信他会在明年年底之前被提升为百夫长。这当然是他应得的。

original: He'll be the youngest Centurion in Legion history.
translation: 他将成为军团历史上最年轻的百夫长。

original: Tell me about Dominicus Rex.
translation: 跟我说说多米尼库斯·勒克斯。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: That's enough about the commanders.
translation: 关于指挥官的事就说到这里。

original: I do not believe that he was a traitor as many of my soldiers do. I also do not believe that this was the judgment of Mars.
translation: 我不像我的许多士兵那样认为他是叛徒，我也不相信这是玛尔斯的判决。

original: We were out-battled, plain and simple. Perhaps, if Caesar were personally commanding, it would have been different.
translation: 我们被打败了，就这么简单。也许，如果凯撒亲自指挥，情况会有所不同。

original: It is a mistake to underestimate our enemies, and the NCR is the most dangerous Profligate force we have ever faced.
translation: 低估我们的敌人是错误的，NCR是我们所面对的最危险的堕落的力量。

original: Our troops will need to be at peak performance to defeat them.
translation: 我们的部队需要达到最佳状态才能打败他们。

original: What do you think about the Burned Man?
translation: 你怎么看火烧人？

original: You sound like Dominicus Rex. He told me that it was bad luck the last time I visited Solitare.
translation: 你听起来像多米尼库斯·勒克斯，他告诉我上次我去索利泰尔的时候运气不好。

original: He tried to convince me to relocate there, but its distance from the camp's unfortunately precludes this possbility.
translation: 他试图说服我搬迁到那里，但不幸的是，那里离营地太远，排除了这个可能。

original: So, you're posting another legate in Malpais despite your previous defeat?
translation: 这么说，尽管之前失败了，还是要在马尔帕斯再派一个特使？

original: That is not for me to say. His name has been stricken from the record.
translation: 那不是我该说的，他的名字已从记录中删除了。

original: Does the Burned Man have a name?
translation: 火烧人有名字吗？

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: I have questions about the other commanders.
translation: 我有关于其他指挥官的问题。

original: It was during the war with Rangers. I helped salvage supplies for my Centurion outside Sentinel, which proved decisive in holding off their assault.
translation: 那是在与游骑兵作战期间。我在哨兵城外帮助我的百夫长抢救物资，这对挡住他们的进攻起到了决定性的作用。

original: Given my long record, it was only natural I was promoted.
translation: 考虑到我的长期工作记录，我被提升是很自然的。

original: How did you become an Optio?
translation: 你是怎么成为执行官的？

original: A fearsome group of demonic warriors who wore black armor.
translation: 一群身穿黑色盔甲的可怕恶魔战士。

original: They were the supreme Profligates of Arizona, holding themselves to be the arbiters of order, but never achieving it.
translation: 他们是亚利桑那最堕落的人，自认为是秩序的仲裁者，但从来没有做到过。

original: After they were broken at Quartz, they fled to the NCR. Our scouts have reported that they have begun returning to the rest of the front.
translation: 他们在阔茨赛特被击溃后，逃到了NCR。我们的斥候报告说，他们已经开始返回前线的其他地方了。

original: A bad omen, in my view.
translation: 在我看来，这是个坏兆头。

original: Tell me about the Rangers.
translation: 跟我说说游骑兵的事吧。

original: Every tribe from Arizona that you see in the Legion fought them at some point. Every Legionary fears them and rightly so.
translation: 你在军团中看到的每个来自亚利桑那的部落都曾与他们作战过。每个军团士兵都害怕他们，这是理所当然的。

original: The most devoted Legionaries believe that they are Mars' fallen angels. Others believe that they are evil spirits from before the Great War.
translation: 最忠诚的军团成员相信他们是玛尔斯的堕落天使，其他人则认为它们是战前的恶灵。

original: The younger Legionaries view them as no different than the common NCR dregs. They are fools and will have to educated accordingly.
translation: 年轻的军团士兵认为他们与普通的NCR渣滓没有什么不同。他们是傻瓜，必须接受相应的教育。

original: I confess that I have no desire to fight them again. I am not sure we will win, especially since they have stirred the NCR against us.
translation: 我承认我不想再和他们战斗了。我不确定我们会赢，特别是他们已经煽动NCR反对我们了。

original: We must drill intensively and continuously to defeat these demons.
translation: 我们必须坚持不懈地刻苦操练，打败这些恶魔。

original: How do your Legionaries feel about the Rangers?
translation: 你的军团士兵对游骑兵有什么看法？

original: So long.
translation: 再见。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: Before the war, the Legion spent the past two decades building up its strength to take on the major powers of Arizona.
translation: 战争开始之前，军团花了过去二十年的时间来增强自己的力量，以对抗亚利桑那州的主要力量。

original: After that, we launched a continuous push westwards. The Rangers had been weakened by their own continuous war with the raiders.
translation: 在那之后，我们开始持续向西推进。游骑兵已经被他们自己与掠夺者的持续战争削弱了。

original: Unlike us, the Rangers never exterminated or fully assimilated the tribes they warred with. It proved to be their weakness.
translation: 与我们不同的是，游骑兵从来没有消灭或完全同化与他们交战的部落。事实证明，这是他们的弱点。

original: Ultimately, we took Quartz, forcing the Rangers to flee to the NCR.
translation: 最终，我们占领了阔茨赛特，迫使游骑兵逃到NCR。

original: But the war was long and costly, killing so many Legionaries that we thought it might be the end.
translation: 但这场战争旷日持久，代价高昂，牺牲了太多的军团士兵，我们认为这可能到此结束了。

original: And the Rangers are returning. They may wear different uniforms now, but it's them.
translation: 然而游骑兵也回来了。他们现在可能穿着不同的制服，但就是他们。

original: How did the Legion defeat the Rangers?
translation: 军团是怎么打败游骑兵的？

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: That's enough about the Rangers.
translation: 游骑兵的事到此为止。

original: I have four contracts available. Two deserted Legionaries named Serratus and Screaming Eagle. And a lost caravan.
translation: 我有四份合同。两名逃跑的军团士兵，名叫锡兰杜英和啸鹰，还有一辆丢失的大篷车。

original: Bring back the heads of the Legionaries, and the caravan safe and sound. Each head is 75 denarii, provided I can tell who I'm looking at.
translation: 把军团的人头带回来，让商队安然无恙。每个人头75第纳尔，前提是我能认出我看到的是谁。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: I have four contracts. Two deserted Legionaries named Serratus and Screaming Eagle. And a lost caravan.
translation: 我有四份合同。两名逃跑的军团士兵，名叫锡兰杜英和啸鹰，还有一辆丢失的大篷车。

original: Bring back the heads of the Legionaries, and the caravan safe and sound.
translation: 把军团的人头带回来，让商队安然无恙。

original: Might be, if you give me their names.
translation: 有可能，只要你告诉我他们的名字。

original: Cal. Who are you?
translation: 卡尔。你是谁？

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: This is the Velvet Ditch. Moletown's Mushroom Coffee Cafe.
translation: 这里是天鹅绒沟，鼹鼠镇的蘑菇咖啡馆。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: I just make the coffee.
translation: 我只是煮咖啡的。

original: Did you build this place?
translation: 这地方是你建的？

original: On the face of it, the NCR is as good as it gets. Clean water. Good harvests.
translation: 从表面上看，NCR已经很好了。干净的水，好收成。

original: What do you think of the NCR?
translation: 你觉得NCR如何？

original: The Legion? heh. I try not to think of them at all.
translation: 军团？呵呵，我尽量不去想它们。

original: What do you think of the Legion?
translation: 你对军团怎么看？

original: My mistake.
translation: 我的错。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: You have no idea what you're talking about.
translation: 你根本不知道自己在说什么。

original: Sure can.
translation: 当然可以。

original: Can you sell me something?
translation: 你能卖给我一些东西吗？

original: Seeya.
translation: 再会。

original: Goodbye
translation: 再见。

original: Clean water's a monopoly. Good harvests are for the Barons.
translation: 干净的水被垄断，好收成是贵族们的事。

original: For a mighty few, it's a paradise.
translation: 对少数人来说，它是天堂。

original: On the face of it?
translation: 从表面上看？

original: Yes. Have you?
translation: 是啊，你呢？

original: Have you ever been?
translation: 你去过吗？

original: Not much is worse than a hole in the ground.
translation: 没有什么比地上的洞更糟糕的了。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: It's certainly not perfect, but it's better than here.
translation: 它当然不完美，但比这里好。

original: I am.
translation: 我是。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: You sound like you're speaking from experience.
translation: 听起来你很有经验。

original: In Shady Sands, maybe.
translation: 在沙荫镇，也许吧。

original: People in the countryside might disagree.
translation: 农村的人可能不这么认为。

original: You're wrong. The NCR is the best nation on earth. Everyone has the same opportunity to succeed.
translation: 你错了。NCR是世界上最好的国家，每个人都有同样的机会获得成功。

original: Very well. Did you have further business to discuss?
translation: 很好。你还有别的事要谈吗？

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Dont worry about it.
translation: 别担心。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 你需要什么？

original: What do you mean?
translation: 你是什么意思？

original: Used to be country doctor. Seen all sorts.
translation: 我以前是乡村医生，见过各种各样的。

original: Not a lot of success stories out there.
translation: 没有多少成功的故事。

original: The countryside?
translation: 农村？

original: Mhm.
translation: 嗯。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: If they're struggling, it's because they're not trying hard enough.
translation: 如果他们在挣扎，那是因为他们不够努力。

original: If you say so.
translation: 既然你这么说。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: Yes, the frontier towns aren't as developed, but they'll catch up!
translation: 是的，边境城镇没有那么发达，但他们会赶上来的！

original: Long days. Lots of walking.
translation: 漫长的日子，要走很多路。

original: Was hard, but I liked it.
translation: 虽然很难，但我喜欢。

original: Anyways....
translation: 总之...

original: You used to be a doctor? What was that like?
translation: 你以前是个医生？是什么样子的？

original: None that you'd want to hear.
translation: 没有一个是你想听的。

original: Anywho. How can I help you?
translation: 随便吧。我能帮你什么忙吗？

original: Do you have any stories from the countryside?
translation: 你有关于农村的故事吗？

original: No can do. Too shaky nowadays.
translation: 我无能为力，现在太不稳定了。

original: I'm hurt. Can you treat me?
translation: 我受伤了，你能给我治疗吗？

original: Ask away.
translation: 问吧。

original: Lets talk about something else
translation: 我们谈点别的吧。

original: Nothing wrong with that.
translation: 这没什么不好的。

original: I left my hometown too early. I sure wish I spent a bit more time there when I could.
translation: 我离开家乡太早了，我真希望我能在那里多呆一会儿。

original: Not really. Up until recently, I never really left my home town.
translation: 不完全是。直到最近我才真正离开我的家乡。

original: Sorry kid, but you'd need to be a centenarian to have done all that.
translation: 抱歉，孩子，但你得是个百岁老人才能做到这些。

original: Unless you're President Tandi, or me, I doubt you've seen even a tenth of it.
translation: 除非你是坦蒂总统，或者我，否则我怀疑你连其中的十分之一都没看过。

original: I've traveled through most of it.
translation: 大部分地区我都去过。

original: Small towns are the real heart of the NCR.
translation: 小城镇是NCR的真正核心。

original: Ive been to some of it. Mostly smaller towns
translation: 我去过一些地方，主要是小城镇。

original: Just making conversation, pal.
translation: 只是随便聊聊，伙计。

original: You're not very good at this, are you?
translation: 你不太擅长这个，是吧？

original: Thats none of your business. Where are you from?
translation: 这不关你的事。你是哪里人？

original: AZCalBQNCRResponse02ABE
translation: 你有什么任务，我都可以完成。

original: Is that so?
translation: 是这样吗？

original: Here's hoping you screw up less than I did.
translation: 希望你能比我少搞砸一些。

original: I know the feeling. I'm on my own sort of adventure right now.
translation: 我知道那种感觉，我现在正在进行自己的冒险。

original: AZCalBQNCRResponse02AA
translation: 我准备好了。要我干什么？

original: That's not important. What can I get you?
translation: 那不重要。你要点什么？

original: I'm sorry to hear that. Where's your home town? Close by?
translation: 听到这个消息我很难过。你的家乡在哪里？近吗？

original: More like running to something. New lands, adventure. Strange undiscovered cultures.
translation: 更像是奔向什么东西。新的土地，冒险，陌生的未知文化。

original: That was a long time ago.
translation: 那是很久以前的事了。

original: Why'd you leave so early? Were you running from something?
translation: 你为什么离开得这么早？你是在逃避什么吗？

original: Until you have proven yourself worthy of it, the fourth contract will be withheld from you.
translation: 在你证明自己配得上它之前，第四份合约将不会给你。

original: That's three.
translation: 这是三个。

original: One of the deserters. He was due to be punished for delivering a cargo of Sunset Sasparilla to the legate's tent too early in the morning.
translation: 逃兵之一。他本应受到惩罚，因为他一大早就把一批夕阳沙士送到了特使的帐篷里。

original: He is likely in the vicinity of the Rusty Hooks. Ask them about it.
translation: 他可能就在锈钩帮附近，问问他们。

original: Screaming Eagle.
translation: 啸鹰。

original: That is, unfortunately, unacceptable. The legate's word is the law. Go back and kill him.
translation: 不幸的是，这是不可接受的。特使的话就是法律，回去杀了他。

original: Screaming Eagle wants to return.
translation: 啸鹰想要回来。

original: One of the deserters. He fled north after demanding a post closer to battle and being denied by the legate.
translation: 逃兵之一。他要求在离战场更近的地方驻防，但遭到了特使的拒绝，于是逃往北方。

original: He possesses blond hair and green eyes. Search around the Arizona Spillway for where he might have gone.
translation: 他有金色的头发和绿色的眼睛。在亚利桑那泄洪道周围搜索他可能去了哪里。

original: Serratus.
translation: 锡兰杜英。

original: That is, unfortunately, unacceptable. The legate's word is the law. Go back and kill him.
translation: 不幸的是，这是不可接受的。特使的话就是法律，回去杀了他。

original: Serratus wants to return.
translation: 锡兰杜英想回来。

original: Oh, it's a simple job. The caravan was probably attacked by hostile wildlife in the vicinity of 3-Some Caravan headquarters.
translation: 哦，这是份简单的工作。商队可能在三人行商队总部附近遭到了敌对野生动物的袭击。

original: The caravan.
translation: 商队。

original: Long enough, I guess.
translation: 够久了，我猜。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: How long have you been down here?
translation: 你在这里多久了？

original: Sure, pal. I believe you.
translation: 当然，伙计，我相信你。

original: I'm telling the truth. I've been all over the place.
translation: 我说的是实话，我到处都去过。

original: Well, they're old lands now. What can I get you?
translation: 好吧，它们现在是旧土地了。你要点什么？

original: "New lands?" Where'd you go?
translation: "新的土地？"你去哪了？

original: A whole lot of walking. Slightly less violence.
translation: 走了很多路，稍微不那么暴力。

original: Most times it was self-defense.
translation: 大多数时候是出于自卫。

original: What can I get you?
translation: 不知道您有什么需要？

original: "Adventure?" What did you do?
translation: “冒险？”你做了什么？

original: Doesn't matter. They're long gone now.
translation: 没关系，他们早就没了。

original: Enough about that, what can I get you?
translation: 别说这些了，你想要点什么？

original: "Strange new cultures?" Who did you meet?
translation: "陌生的新文化？"你遇到了谁？

original: If you say so.
translation: 你说了算。

original: They don't control me. I come and go as I please.
translation: 他们控制不了我。我想来就来，想走就走。

original: Does that matter?
translation: 这重要吗？

original: How long ago was that?
translation: 那是多久以前的事了？

original: Big ones, small ones.
translation: 大的，小的。

original: Enough about me, what can I get you?
translation: 别说我了，你想要点什么？

original: What sort of screw ups? Anything bad?
translation: 出现了什么问题？什么坏事？

original: Too many to count.
translation: 太多了，数不清。

original: Have you hurt people?
translation: 你伤害过别人吗？

original: I didn't. I'm sure you won't mean any harm, too.
translation: 我没有。我相信你也不会有什么恶意。

original: Doesn't make much difference to the people getting harmed.
translation: 对受到伤害的人来说也没什么区别。

original: What do you want?
translation: 你想要什么？

original: I'm sure you didn't mean any harm.
translation: 我相信你没有恶意。

original: This is me getting over it. Now what do you want?
translation: 我就是在克服。现在你想要什么？

original: I've hurt people too. It happens. Get over it.
translation: 我也伤害过别人。这种事时有发生，克服它吧。

original: I don't want to talk about it.
translation: 我不想再说这个了。

original: You've hurt a lot of people, haven't you?
translation: 你伤害过很多人，不是吗？

original: Drop it.
translation: 停。

original: How many?
translation: 有多少？

original: A lot of things. Things I don't have time to talk about right now. Another time, perhaps.
translation: 很多事情，有些事我现在没时间跟你说。也许下次吧。

original: What did you do?
translation: 你做了什么？

original: I'm telling you. Drop it.
translation: 我说过了，停。

original: How many?
translation: 有多少？

original: Good. Now what do you want?
translation: 很好。现在你想要什么？

original: Okay, I'll drop it.
translation: 好吧，我不提了。

original: Out.
translation: 出去。

original: How many?
translation: 有多少？

original: Too many. I don't know.
translation: 太多了。我不知道。

original: I can't know.
translation: 我不能知道。

original: Why do you think I'm holed up here? You think I want to be living in a cave?
translation: 不然你以为我为什么躲在这里？你以为我想住在山洞里吗？

original: You have no idea, do you? You're heartless.
translation: 你不知道，是吗？你真没心没肺。

original: I know.
translation: 我知道。

original: You're a coward.
translation: 你是个懦夫。

original: That's the plan.
translation: 这就是计划。

original: So you're just going to die here in this hole?
translation: 所以你就死在这个洞里？

original: That's the plan.
translation: 这就是计划。

original: You disgust me, I hope you die.
translation: 你让我恶心，我希望你去死。

original: Sure, pal, I'm sure you won't.
translation: 当然，伙计，我相信你不会的。

original: You're a total bum. I'll never be like you.
translation: 你真是个废物，我永远不会像你一样。

original: I did.
translation: 我有。

original: I think I lost the last of it once I started this conversation.
translation: 我想当我开始谈话的时候，最后一点都没了。

original: Don't you have any respect for yourself? Any integrity at all?
translation: 你一点都不尊重自己吗？有诚信吗？

original: Says the person interrogating me. You're pretty nosy, you know that?
translation: 审问我的人说这种话。你很爱管闲事，你知道吗？

original: Let's just cut the conversation off here. Okay?
translation: 我们就到此为止吧，好吗？

original: That's pretty rude.
translation: 这太无礼了。

original: I try to be.
translation: 我努力做到。

original: Enough about all that, what can I get you?
translation: 不说这些了，你要点什么？

original: You're a funny guy.
translation: 你是个有趣的人。

original: That's because I don't want to answer it.
translation: 那是因为我不想回答这个问题。

original: You're dodging my question.
translation: 你在回避我的问题。

original: Not at all.
translation: 随便问。

original: It's irresponsible to worry about them all the time.
translation: 总是担心他们是不负责任的。

original: Bad for your mental health.
translation: 不利于你的心理健康。

original: Don't you think thats a bit irresponsible?
translation: 你不觉得那有点不负责任吗？

original: I used to be the same. After awhile you get used to it.
translation: 我以前也是这样，过一段时间你就习惯了。

original: How could you possibly not think about them? They're a constant threat on my mind.
translation: 你怎么可能不去想他们呢？他们一直是我脑海中的威胁。

original: No thanks.
translation: 不用谢。

original: You should be worshipping them.
translation: 你应该崇拜他们。

original: I wouldn't say that.
translation: 我不这么认为。

original: Their bite certainly hurts. Seen the Legion sink its jaws into plenty people.
translation: 它们咬人确实很痛，我见过军团把很多人咬死。

original: Enough about that, what can I get you?
translation: 别说这些了，你想要点什么？

original: The Legion is more bark than bite. You've got the right idea.
translation: 军团就是爱叫的狗不咬人，你的想法是对的。

original: You're not wrong.
translation: 你说得没错。

original: You got a reason you're reaming me out here?
translation: 你有什么理由在这里训斥我吗？

original: You live a pretty sad life.
translation: 你的生活很悲惨。

original: Not hiding, but I also dont exactly want them to find me. Does that make sense?
translation: 我不是在躲，但我也不想让他们找到我。明白了吗？

original: Clear as mud, yeah?
translation: 清清楚楚，对吧？

original: Are you hiding from them?
translation: 你是在躲他们吗？

original: It's worked so far.
translation: 到目前为止，这是有效的。

original: Keep running your mouth and I'll start ignoring you too.
translation: 你再胡言乱语，我也会开始无视你的。

original: They control all of this territory. You can't possibly ignore them forever.
translation: 他们控制了这片土地，你不可能永远无视他们。

original: Nowhere's safer than here, friend. Thanks for the offer though.
translation: 没有比这里更安全的了，朋友。不过还是谢谢你的好意。

original: Enough about me, whats a puppyheaded berk like you doing with something like that?
translation: 别说我了，像你这样的蠢货怎么会有这种东西？

original: I have the Mark of Caesar.  I could get you somewhere safer if you like.
translation: 我有凯撒的徽记。如果你愿意，我可以带你去更安全的地方。

original: Nice try pal. That's either a fake or a find.
translation: 干得好，伙计。要么是假的，要么是偶然找到的。

original: King Ed dont just give those things out for free.
translation: 爱德华国王可不会免费提供这些东西。

original: I was given it.
translation: 是别人给我的。

original: Earned doing what? Fastest crucifixion?
translation: 做什么挣来的？最快上十字架？

original: Cleanest toga?
translation: 最干净的长袍？

original: You didn't earn shit.
translation: 你什么都没挣到。

original: Anywho. What can I grab you?
translation: 随便吧。你想要点什么？

original: I earned it.
translation: 这是我挣来的。

original: Why? To hang on your wall? The thing is useless.
translation: 为什么？挂在墙上？毫无用处的东西。

original: It won't protect you if they want you dead. You know that, right?
translation: 如果他们想置你于死地，它也保护不了你。你知道的，对吧？

original: I wanted it.
translation: 我想要的。

original: Must've been a pretty high-profile fight.
translation: 那一定是一场备受瞩目的战斗。

original: Who won?
translation: 谁赢了？

original: I fought for it.
translation: 我为它而战。

original: I'm sure.
translation: 我确信。

original: I don't know. It just sort of happened.
translation: 我不知道。事情就这么发生了。

original: Only a stupid asshole would carry the Mark of Caesar.
translation: 只有蠢货才会带着凯撒的徽记。

original: Did you just call me a stupid asshole?
translation: 你刚才叫我蠢货吗？

original: I don't think we're expecting any mail.
translation: 我不认为我们会收到任何邮件。

original: What's a mail monkey doing here, anyway?
translation: 邮递猿在这里做什么？

original: I'm a courier.
translation: 我是个邮差。

original: Sure. We're all nobodies here.
translation: 当然，我们在这里都是无名小卒。

original: I'm a nobody.
translation: 我是个无名小卒。

original: Ah.
translation: 啊。

original: Now, why would you serve someone like Caesar?
translation: 那么，你为什么要服侍像凯撒这样的人？

original: I'm a servant of Caesar.
translation: 我是凯撒的仆人。

original: How'd you end up doing that?
translation: 你怎么会这么做？

original: Paying back a gambling debt?
translation: 偿还赌债？

original: I'm a representative of Mr. House.
translation: 我是豪斯先生的代表。

original: Is that so? Pretty far from Shady Sands. You go AWOL?
translation: 是吗？这里离沙荫镇很远。你擅离职守了？

original: I'm an agent of the NCR.
translation: 我是NCR的探员。

original: That's all it takes to win you over, huh?
translation: 这样就能赢得你的芳心，对吧？

original: Caesar is the strongest in the Wasteland.
translation: 凯撒是废土上最强大的。

original: I'm sure they do.
translation: 我相信他们会。

original: The Legion pays well.
translation: 军团给的挺多。

original: "Profligate Scum" huh?
translation: "堕落的人渣"是吧？

original: Let me ask you something. What makes a Profligate a Profligate?
translation: 让我来问你个问题，是什么让一个堕落者成为堕落者？

original: Caesar will cleanse the wastes of Profligate scum.
translation: 凯撒将清除那些堕落的人渣。

original: I doubt that.
translation: 我对此表示怀疑。

original: I'm indebted to him. He saved my life.
translation: 我欠他一个人情，他救了我的命。

original: Simple as that, huh? How's the pay?
translation: 就这么简单，是吧？工资怎么样？

original: What's he paying you in? Caps or Casino Chips?
translation: 他付给你什么钱？瓶盖还是赌场筹码？

original: He contracted me to do a job. Simple as that.
translation: 他委托我做一项工作，就是这么简单。

original: And what might that be?
translation: 那是什么呢？

original: I believe in his vision for a better future.
translation: 我相信他对美好未来的憧憬。

original: Oh?
translation: 哦？

original: Did I forget to pay my taxes?
translation: 我忘记交税了吗？

original: <Lie.> I'm here on official orders.
translation: <说谎>我是奉官方命令来的。

original: How's that working out for you? Get good intel?
translation: 这对你来说怎么样？得到好情报了吗？

original: I'm spying for them behind lines.
translation: 我在后方为他们做间谍。

original: It means whatever you want it to mean.
translation: 意思是你想让它是什么就是什么。

original: Now what do you want?
translation: 现在你要什么？

original: What's that supposed to mean?
translation: 这话什么意思？

original: Really? Damn.
translation: 真的？该死。

original: I'd sure like a love letter.
translation: 我很想要一封情书。

original: Oh, I'm not here to deliver a package.
translation: 哦，我不是来送包裹的。

original: You'll have to forgive me for not fully believing that.
translation: 请原谅我没有完全相信你的话。

original: You're telling me wandered out into the desert.
translation: 你是说我跑到沙漠里。

original: Walked into an abandoned mineshaft with a big ol' sign that says "DEATHCLAWS AHEAD" out front.
translation: 我走进了一个废弃的矿井，前面有个大牌子写着"前方有死亡爪"。

original: Walked past *another* sign saying the same thing.
translation: 又走过*另一个*牌子，上面写着同样的话。

original: Opened up a locked gate.
translation: 打开一扇锁着的门。

original: Squeezed past a metal shelf...
translation: 挤过一个金属架子...

original: ...another sign...
translation: ...另一个指示牌...

original: ...and somehow talked your way past our doorman.
translation: ...不知怎么就绕过了我们的门卫。

original: All by accident?
translation: 都是偶然？

original: I just sort of stumbled upon this place.
translation: 我只是偶然发现了这个地方。

original: You, uh, what?
translation: 你，呃，什么？

original: Well, you sure know how to bumblefuck your way into places.
translation: 好吧，你还真是知道怎么混进别人的圈子啊。

original: I'll give you that.
translation: 我得承认。

original: I swear. I really have no idea how I ended up here.
translation: 我发誓。我真的不知道我是怎么来到这里的。

original: Whatever. What do you want?
translation: 随便了。你想要什么？

original: It wasn't that difficult to find this place. Whoever tried to cover it up didn't try hard enough.
translation: 找到这个地方并不难，想掩盖真相的人还不够努力。

original: Bullshit.
translation: 胡扯。

original: You missed three whole signs?
translation: 你错过了三个指示牌？

original: Can you read?
translation: 你识字吗？

original: You *can* read, right?
translation: 你识字，对吧？

original: <Lie.> Must have missed the signs....
translation: <说谎>肯定是错过了指示牌...

original: Fair point.
translation: 有道理。

original: Why would anyone send mail to some old hermit?
translation: 为什么会有人给老隐士寄信呢？

original: Calls em as I sees em.
translation: 我看到什么就说什么。

original: Who are you calling a mail monkey?
translation: 你管谁叫邮递猿？

original: Well, you found one.
translation: 好吧，你找到了。

original: I was looking for somewhere to hideaway.
translation: 我想找个地方躲起来。

original: If you say so.
translation: 既然你这么说。

original: Except I'm different. Getting shot in the head only made me stronger.
translation: 只是我与众不同，头部中枪只会让我更坚强。

original: You already told me your job, pal. It ain't anything luxurious.
translation: 你已经告诉过我你的工作了，伙计，并不奢华。

original: Besides, if you're so famous, then how come I don't give a damn about you?
translation: 再说，如果你这么有名，那我怎么一点都不在乎你呢？

original: I'm not some errand boy. I'm *the Courier*. I'm famous.
translation: 我不是什么跑腿的，我是*邮差*，我很有名。

original: You're right about that. I have *no* idea who I'm talking to.
translation: 你说得对。我完全*不*知道我在跟谁说话。

original: You have no idea who you're talking to.
translation: 你根本不知道你在跟谁说话。

original: That's supposed to make you special?
translation: 这就能让你与众不同吗？

original: Do you have any idea how many people I know that have been shot in the head?
translation: 你知道我认识的人中有多少人被爆头吗？

original: I did not get shot in the head doing my job just to be called a mail monkey.
translation: 我在工作中被爆头可不是为了被称为邮递猿。

original: Heh. Some of em.
translation: 呵呵，有几个。

original: Modern medicine at work.
translation: 现代医学在起作用。

original: How many of them got back up after?
translation: 之后又有多少人站起来了？

original: Sure. Customer's always right.
translation: 当然。顾客永远是对的。

original: I am not a mail monkey.
translation: 我不是邮递猿。

original: Nothing. It's not important.
translation: 没什么，这并不重要。

original: What the hell are you talking about?
translation: 你到底在说什么？

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: I'm just not interested in your sob-story. Keep it to yourself.
translation: 我只是对你的哭诉故事不感兴趣。不要告诉别人。

original: Are you trying to one-up me? It's not a competition.
translation: 你想胜过我吗？这不是比赛。

original: Of course.
translation: 当然。

original: I can't tell you that.
translation: 我不能告诉你。

original: Don't underestimate them.
translation: 不要低估他们。

original: Yes. I've learned that the Legion is weak.
translation: 是的，我知道军团很虚弱。

original: As mighty as they are, they have their weaknesses.
translation: 虽然他们很强大，但他们也有弱点。

original: A system built around one man is inherently unstable.
translation: 以一个人为中心建立的体系本质上是不稳定的。

original: Once King Ed's out, what then?
translation: 一旦爱德华国王出局了，接下来怎么办？

original: How do you tell state full of warlords that their god is dead and his throne is up for grabs?
translation: 你要怎么告诉一个军阀林立的国家他们的神已经死了，他的王位正在被争夺？

original: Yes. I've learned that the Legion is strong.
translation: 是的，我了解到军团很强大。

original: You're not a very good spy, then.
translation: 那你不是个好间谍。

original: No, I haven't found anything useful yet.
translation: 没有，还没找到有用的东西。

original: The big guy. What's his name...
translation: 那个大块头。他名字叫什么...

original: Ky Sar!
translation: 开撒！

original: King Ed?
translation: 爱德华国王？

original: That ain't his name. His name is Edward. Did you know that?
translation: 那不是他的名字。他的名字叫爱德华，你知道吗？

original: Turns out he's just a guy. "Ky Sar" is just a title or something.
translation: 原来他只是个普通人，“开撒”只是个头衔什么的。

original: Did you seriously just forget his name?
translation: 你真的忘了他的名字吗？

original: You're probably right, one of his cronies would likely take over. But for how long?
translation: 你可能是对的，他的一个亲信可能会接管。但能维持多久呢？

original: And who? and where?
translation: 谁呢？在哪里？

original: What happens if some up-start in Two-Sun decides to muscle themselves in?
translation: 如果双日城的一些新贵决定强行加入，会发生什么？

original: Who's going to stop Legatus Lorem Ipsum out East deciding he wants his own slice of the cherry pie?
translation: 谁能阻止东方的乱数假文特使决定自己分一杯羹呢？

original: No one, that's who.
translation: 没有人，就是那个人。

original: The Legate Lanius would take over for Caesar.
translation: 拉尼厄斯特使将接替凯撒。

original: You're likely right. It'll endure until it doesn't.
translation: 你可能是对的。它会一直存在，直到它消失。

original: Nothing lasts forever, kid.
translation: 没有什么是永恒的，孩子。

original: Caesar won't die. Even if he could die, the Legion is strong enough to endure.
translation: 凯撒不会死的。即使他会死，军团也足够强大，可以承受。

original: Maybe I am. I hope so.
translation: 也许我是。我希望如此。

original: Maybe you're right.
translation: 也许你是对的。

original: Oh, you're no fun.
translation: 哦，你真没意思。

original: I'm sorry, I don't know anything about politics.
translation: 对不起，我对政治一窍不通。

original: That's pretty reductive, don't you think?
translation: 你不觉得这太简单了吗？

original: That's pretty reductive, don't you think?
translation: 你不觉得这太简单了吗？

original: You haven't cracked open a history book recently, have you?
translation: 你最近没读过历史书吧？

original: It's just too big to collapse.
translation: 它太大了，不可能垮掉。

original: You like it?
translation: 你喜欢吗？

original: "The Velvet Ditch"? That's quite a name
translation: “天鹅绒沟”？这名字真好听。

original: Brewing coffee. Talking to you.
translation: 煮咖啡，跟你说话。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: You should try it, it's good for you.
translation: 你应该试试，对你有好处。

original: We use a house blend of Turkey Tail, Chaga and Golden Teacher.
translation: 我们用的是云芝，白桦茸和黄金老师的混合配方。

original: Dry those out, grind, 'em, mix 'em with some Cuppa Joe, and you got a brew going.
translation: 把它们弄干，磨碎，然后和咖啡混合在一起，就可以煮了。

original: Mushroom coffee? I've never heard of that.
translation: 蘑菇咖啡？我从来没听说过。

original: Well, that's mighty kind.
translation: 嗯，那真是太好了。

original: I love it.
translation: 我很喜欢。

original: Well, keep your opinion to yourself.
translation: 好吧，你的意见还是留着吧。

original: I hate it.
translation: 我讨厌。

original: Just poking fun at my compatriots here. This little hole in the ground seems like a nice place to get stuck in. Comfy to stay, hard to leave.
translation: 只是在这里取笑一下我的同胞。 这个地上的小洞似乎是个不错的栖身之地，呆着舒服，走着难受。

original: A velvet ditch, heh.
translation: 天鹅绒沟，呵呵。

original: I don't get it.
translation: 我不明白。

original: Okay, then.
translation: 那好吧。

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Yeah, right. What can I get you?
translation: 是的，没错。你要点什么？

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: Like hell I do.
translation: 我才不干呢。

original: I'm serious, you need to pay me your taxes.
translation: 我是认真的，你得把税交给我。

original: Trametes Veriscolor.
translation: 变色栓菌。

original: It's a whiterot fungus.
translation: 这是一种白腐菌。

original: Turkey Tail?
translation: 云芝？

original: Inonotus Obliquus.
translation: 桦褐孔菌。

original: Grows on Birch and other woods.
translation: 生长在桦树和其他树木上。

original: It's the primary source of the coffee taste of our... er... coffee.
translation: 它是我们...呃...咖啡味道的主要来源。

original: Chaga?
translation: 白桦茸？

original: Psilocybe Cubensis
translation: 古巴裸盖菇。

original: Comes in a few varieties. Any'll do the trick though.
translation: 有几个品种，任何一种都可以。

original: It's potent stuff. We use just a bit  in the brew. Just enough to keep us peppy and present.
translation: 这是一种烈性物质。我们在酿造时只用一点点，足以让我们保持精力充沛。

original: Golden Teacher?
translation: 黄金老师？

original: I don't doubt that he kept you alive.
translation: 我不怀疑是他让你活下来的。

original: I doubt that he saved your life.
translation: 我怀疑他没救过你。

original: From what I heard, Mr. House don't care much about saving lives.
translation: 据我所知，豪斯先生不太在乎拯救生命。

original: He literally pulled me from a grave.
translation: 他真的把我从坟墓里拉了出来。

original: Well that was mighty kind of him I s'pose.
translation: 好吧，我想他真是个好人。

original: It's true! He sent a robot to save my life.
translation: 这是真的！他派了一个机器人来救我。

original: That's a mighty fine dream.
translation: 那是一个非常美好的梦想。

original: Who benefits though? Vegas is already strong enough to help the rest of the Mojave.
translation: 但谁会受益呢？维加斯已经强大到足以帮助莫哈维的其他地区了。

original: Last I heard, all those caps from the Strip are staying on the Strip.
translation: 上次我听说所有从长街来的瓶盖都要留在长街。

original: He believes in a Mojave that is independent of the NCR and strong enough to resist the Legion
translation: 他相信莫哈维可以独立于NCR，强大到足以抵抗军团。

original: And how exactly does he plan to do that?
translation: 他到底打算怎么做？

original: He's a ruthless business man who will outflank the NCR and outsmart the Legion.
translation: 他是一个冷酷无情的商人，他会包抄NCR，智取军团。

original: A free market?
translation: 自由市场？

original: Nothing free about it.
translation: 没什么是自由的。

original: Who'll stop the Three Families from moving their Caps into local farms? House already controls the strip. You want him to control food as well?
translation: 谁来阻止三大家族把他们的瓶盖搬到当地的农场？豪斯已经控制了长街，你还想让他控制食物吗？

original: What about the water? The trade routes? Hope you've got the caps to pay tolls on every highway, road and dirt path in the damn Mojave.
translation: 那水呢？贸易路线呢？希望你有足够的瓶盖来支付莫哈维的每一条高速公路，道路和土路的通行费。

original: He's going to allow local commerce to flourish in a true free market.
translation: 他将允许本地商业在真正的自由市场中蓬勃发展。

original: What sort of order?
translation: 什么样的秩序？

original: And what happens if folks out in the Sticks disagree on what "Order" ought to mean?
translation: 如果偏远地区的人们对“秩序”的含义有分歧，会发生什么？

original: He's going to send his Securitrons to bring order to the Wasteland.
translation: 他要派他的电子保安去废土恢复秩序。

original: Tricks can only take you so far. What sort of trick stops the NCR or the Legion knocking at the Strip Gates?
translation: 妙计也只能到此为止了，有什么妙计能阻止NCR或者军团去敲长街的大门？

original: He's got some tricks up his sleeve.
translation: 他自有妙计。

original: You should probably figure that out.
translation: 也许你应该弄清楚。

original: I don't know exactly what his plan is, but he's a smart guy and must know what he's doing.
translation: 我不知道他到底有什么计划，但他是个聪明人，肯定知道自己在做什么。

original: No such thing as "playing both sides".
translation: 没有所谓的“渔翁得利”。

original: Not for long anyway.
translation: 反正也不会太久。

original: Eventually, one side puts their foot down and forces you to choose.
translation: 最终，一方会坚持己见，迫使你做出选择。

original: He's going to pit the NCR and the Legion against each other. Profiting from both sides.
translation: 他要让NCR和军团自相残杀，渔翁得利。

original: Right you are.
translation: 你说得对。

original: Good for the brain. Good for the soul.
translation: 对大脑有益，对灵魂有益。

original: You're brewing Coffee with Magic Mushrooms?
translation: 你在用神奇蘑菇煮咖啡？

original: If only it were that simple. Right?
translation: 要是有那么简单就好了。对吧？

original: Folks don't always like being told what to do.
translation: 人们并不总是喜欢被告知该做什么。

original: If they know what's best for them, they won't resist.
translation: 如果他们知道什么对自己最好，他们就不会反抗。

original: Who's law? House's?
translation: 谁的法？豪斯的？

original: What makes walking into town and telling everybody what to do so lawful?
translation: 是什么让走进镇上告诉每个人该做什么是合法的？

original: Those that refuse to comply are breaking the law. They'd be treated like criminals of course.
translation: 那些拒绝遵守的人就是在犯法。当然，他们会被当作罪犯对待。

original: Sure.
translation: 当然。

original: You don't believe that, do you?
translation: 你不相信，对吧？

original: Mr. House is a good man. He would never abuse his power.
translation: 豪斯先生是个好人，他决不会滥用权力。

original: If you say so.
translation: 既然你这么说。

original: Sounds like banditry under a different name to me.
translation: 听起来像是换了个名字的强盗。

original: It doesn't matter if people get hurt in the process. Order is better than banditry.
translation: 如果有人在这个过程中受伤也没关系，秩序比强盗行为好。

original: And what might that be?
translation: 那是什么呢？

original: No. I also believe in Caesar's mission.
translation: 不。我也相信凯撒的使命。

original: Heh.
translation: 呵呵。

original: At least you're honest.
translation: 至少你很诚实。

original: No. But it doesn't hurt.
translation: 没有，但也无伤大雅。

original: Might makes right. Sure.
translation: 强权即公理。当然。

original: I've heard that plenty of times.
translation: 我已经听过很多次了。

original: Yes. Whoever is the strongest deserves to rule.
translation: 是的。谁最强大，谁就应该统治。

original: Funny you say that.
translation: 你这么说真有趣。

original: Normally, it's the weak ones saying that.
translation: 通常都是弱者这么说。

original: Yes. The weak should fear the strong.
translation: 是的。弱者就应该畏惧强者。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: Are you calling me weak?
translation: 你是说我是弱者吗？

original: Maybe not weak in the physical sense.
translation: 也许在物理意义上并不弱。

original: They're weak in brains, that's for sure.
translation: 但他们的大脑很弱，这是肯定的。

original: Are you calling the Legion weak?
translation: 你是说军团很弱吗？

original: Nothing. Don't worry about it.
translation: 没什么，别担心。

original: What are you talking about?
translation: 你说什么呢？

original: Everybody's got their own little nickname for this place.
translation: 每个人都给这地方起了外号。

original: Mine's moletown.
translation: 我起的就是鼹鼠镇。

original: Moletown?
translation: 鼹鼠镇？

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: That's enough about Optios.
translation: 关于执行官就说到这里。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: I have other questions.
translation: 我有些其它问题。

original: Never suggest that again.
translation: 别再提这个了。

original: Marcellus Sedonus has his irregularities, but he is trusted and valued member of the Legion.
translation: 马塞卢斯·塞多尼乌斯有他的不合规行为，但他是军团中值得信任和重视的成员。

original: He seems very erratic. Would you be opposed to having him removed?
translation: 他看起来很古怪。你会反对让他离开吗？

original: Indeed. He's been moving in and out of the Castra Legatus for the past two weeks. Or, so I've been told.
translation: 的确如此。在过去的两周里，他一直在特使军营进进出出。或者，别人是这么告诉我的。

original: Will Lanius be the one to march on Hoover Dam?
translation: 拉尼厄斯会是那个向胡佛水坝进军的人吗？

original: Yes, this is him. Here is your reward.
translation: 是的，就是他。这是你的报酬。

original: I'd like to claim a bounty on Serratus.
translation: 我想申请对锡兰杜英的赏金。

original: I will not be able to dispense the full bounty.
translation: 我就不能给你全部的赏金了。

original: I'd like to claim a bounty on Serratus.
translation: 我想申请对锡兰杜英的赏金。

original: Yes, this is him. Here is your reward.
translation: 是的，就是他。这是你的报酬。

original: I'd like to claim a bounty on Screaming Eagle.
translation: 我想申请对啸鹰的赏金。

original: I will not be able to dispense the full bounty.
translation: 我就不能给你全部的赏金了。

original: I'd like to claim a bounty on Screaming Eagle.
translation: 我想申请对啸鹰的赏金。

original: Ominous. Did you happen to recover their cargo?
translation: 不祥的预兆。你有没有找到他们的货物？

original: I've dealt with the caravan. They've gone mad and were attacking other caravans.
translation: 商队的事我已经解决了。他们疯了，开始袭击其他商队。

original: You have the thanks of the Legion. Rangers have killed scores of Legionaries over the past two decades. I only wish I had more work for you.
translation: 军团对你表示感谢。在过去的二十年里，游骑兵已经杀死了许多军团士兵。我真希望有更多的工作给你。

original: The ranger is dead.
translation: 游骑兵死了。

original: You appear to be serious. There is, unfortunately no way for me to grant you the full bounty.
translation: 看来你是认真的。不幸的是，我没有办法给你全部的赏金。

original: The ranger is dead. The head's a little mangled.
translation: 游骑兵死了，头有点碎了。

original: Is he dead?
translation: 他死了吗？

original: I found the Ranger. He's in a cave by Elephant Hill.
translation: 我找到游骑兵了，他在象山旁边的一个山洞里。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: Nevermind.
translation: 没关系。

original: Excellent. This warrants a further reward.
translation: 太好了。这值得进一步奖励。

original: Yes.
translation: 是的。

original: Unfortunate. Nevertheless, the situation has been resolved. Did you have further business with us?
translation: 很不幸。然而，局势已经得到解决。你们和我们还有生意来往吗?

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Unfortunate. Nevertheless, the situation has been resolved. Did you have further business with us?
translation: 很不幸。然而，局势已经得到解决。你们和我们还有生意来往吗?

original: <Lie.> No.
translation: <说谎>不。

original: I....  You have the thanks of the Legion. You can trust me when I say that.  That's all the bounties I have for you.
translation: 我...军团对你表示感谢。你可以相信我说的话，这就是我给你的全部赏金。

original: He's already dead.
translation: 他已经死了。

original: This is his head? Difficult to say if you're telling the truth, but if you are, you show far more initiative than the average mercenary.
translation: 这是他的头？很难说你是否说的是实话，但如果是的话，你比一般的雇佣兵表现得更主动。

original: In the interest of continued use of your services, I will dispense the full bounty anyways.
translation: 为了继续使用你的服务，我无论如何都会给你全部的赏金。

original: He's already dead.
translation: 他已经死了。

original: Two Rangers killed an entire cohort of Legionaries during the Solitare Insurrection with practically no assistance.
translation: 在索利泰尔叛乱中，两名游骑兵在几乎没有任何援助的情况下杀死了一整群军团士兵。

original: Every Ranger has killed many, many times their number. Take them seriously.
translation: 每一个游骑兵都杀过比他们多很多倍的人。重视他们。

original: The Ranger's exact location is unknown, but it is likely that Ricamore at Elephant Hill might be able to help you.
translation: 游骑兵的确切位置尚不清楚，但象山的里卡莫尔可能会帮到你。

original: Should be no problem.
translation: 应该没问题。

original: Good. Take the Ranger seriously. Speak to Ricamore at Elephant Hill to pinpoint his location.
translation: 很好，认真对待游骑兵吧。跟象山的里卡莫尔谈谈，确定他的位置。

original: I see why you waited.
translation: 我知道你为什么等了。

original: Ye referrin' to the Ranger? It is a Ranger, just s'ye know. I saw him staring down from the hills. I've seen me share o' Rangers.
translation: 你说的是游骑兵？他是个游骑兵，你知道的。我看见他在山上盯着下面看，我见过很多游骑兵。

original: But if ye want more, that'll cost ye.
translation: 但如果你想要更多，就得付钱。

original: I'm looking for information on a bounty.
translation: 我在找赏金的消息。

original: Ready to pay up?
translation: 准备好付钱了吗？

original: I'm looking for information on a bounty.
translation: 我在找赏金的消息。

original: Denarii is the currency o' the Legion. I'll giveya the information ye looking for in exchange for 50 denarii.
translation: 第纳尔是军团的货币。我给你你想要的信息，交换50第纳尔。

original: How much we talking here?
translation: 我们说的是多少钱？

original: This must be about the Legionary we reported in this area. Yes, he's still where we said he was.
translation: 这一定是我们报告过的这个地区的军团成员。是的，他还在我们说的地方。

original: Malpais sent me. They have a bounty on a Legion deserter.
translation: 我是马尔帕斯派来的，他们悬赏一名军团逃兵。

original: Legion deserters are pretty rare. Plenty of bounty hunters have attempted to kill Legionaries and pass them off as deserters.
translation: 军团逃兵很少见。很多赏金猎人都试图杀死军团士兵，并把他们伪装成逃兵。

original: Usually, they're crucified for that when the Legion inevitably finds out that they weren't deserters.
translation: 通常，当军团不可避免地发现他们不是逃兵时，他们就会被钉死在十字架上。

original: Anyways, he's right outside of the camp, down there. You can't miss him.
translation: 总之，他就在营地外面，就在那里。你不会错过他的。

original: How come you haven't taken up this bounty?
translation: 你为什么不接受这个悬赏？

original: Oh, figured that they would send someone eventually. Yes, he's still where we said he was.
translation: 哦，我就知道他们迟早会派人来的。是的，他还在我们说的地方。

original: Malpais sent me. They have a bounty on a Legion deserter.
translation: 我是马尔帕斯派来的，他们悬赏一名军团逃兵。

original: Because the Legion are bunch of assholes. I've never heard of a Legion deserter.
translation: 因为军团都是一群混蛋，我从来没听说过什么军团逃兵。

original: If it is one, then how hard is it to send one guy to get one other guy? I'm keeping out of that.
translation: 如果是一个人，那派一个人去抓另一个人有多难？我不会插手的。

original: How come you haven't taken up this bounty?
translation: 你为什么不接受这个悬赏？

original: I've no use for 'em.
translation: 它们对我没用。

original: Do you take caps?
translation: 你收瓶盖吗？

original: [SUCCESS] Ye.... Okey. The Ranger is in a cave to the south of here. I'll mark eet on ya map.
translation: [成功]好...好吧。游骑兵在南边的一个山洞里，我会在你的地图上做个标记。

original: Any chance I can talk you down to 35?
translation: 我能把价格降到35吗？

original: [FAILED] The heck? No. 50, take it 'o' leave it.
translation: [失败]搞什么？50，要就要不要就算。

original: Any chance I can talk you down to 15?
translation: 我能把价格降到15吗？

original: Well, then, good luck to ye.
translation: 那么，祝你好运。

original: I'll just find him on my own.
translation: 我自己去找他。

original: What? That cannot be. Yes, it is true that the legate was angry, but I have been a loyal Legionary my entire life.
translation: 什么？这不可能。是的，特使确实很生气，但我一生都是一名忠诚的军团士兵。

original: There is a bounty on you. You have angered the legate of Malpais.
translation: 你被悬赏了。你激怒了马尔帕斯的特使。

original: I am Screaming Eagle.
translation: 我是啸鹰。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I am guarding this canyon for the Legion, of course.
translation: 我当然是在为军团守卫这个峡谷。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: Only Caesar can order my death.
translation: 只有凯撒才能下令处死我。

original: <Attack.> Good news! Your life is over.
translation: <攻击>好消息！你的人生结束了。

original: I would appreciate that.
translation: 我很感激。

original: I suppose I could ask if you could return.
translation: 我想我可以问问你是否可以回去。

original: Make a choice or don't.
translation: 要么选择，要么放弃。

original: I'll think about it.
translation: 我会考虑的。

original: Very well. Administer the punishment as you see fit.
translation: 很好。你觉得怎么惩罚就怎么惩罚吧。

original: I have already done that.
translation: 我已经这么做了。

original: I will not die for nothing.
translation: 我不会白白死去。

original: <Attack.> I don't need his permission.
translation: <攻击>我不需要他的允许。

original: I am. If my absence from Malpais was unwarranted, I would be willing to return.
translation: 我是。如果我离开马尔帕斯是没有理由的，我愿意回去。

original: You seem like a loyal Legionary.
translation: 你看起来像个忠诚的军团士兵。

original: Yes, I would. Come back if you have any news.
translation: 是的，我想。有什么消息就回来吧。

original: Would you like me to ask?
translation: 你想让我问吗？

original: Brothers!
translation: 兄弟们！

original: <Attack.> You can ask him in the hereafter.
translation: <攻击>你可以来世再问他。

original: Ah. I knew this day was coming. You are here for the bounty, correct? You should know that I am under the protection of Centurion Rufo.
translation: 啊，我知道这一天迟早会到来。你是来领赏金的，对吧？你应该知道我受到百夫长鲁夫的保护。

original: If he deems it necessary, then I am willing to let you take my life.
translation: 如果他认为有必要，那么我愿意让你夺走我的生命。

original: Blond hair? Green eyes? You are Serratus, are you not?
translation: 金发？绿眼睛？你是锡兰杜英，对吧？

original: You're back. What of the bounty?
translation: 你回来了，悬赏怎么办？

original: I have news.
translation: 我有消息。

original: Vale.
translation: 再会。

original: Goodbye.
translation: 再见。

original: We have no business, then.
translation: 那就没我们的事了。

original: Not yet.
translation: 还没有。

original: I am Rufo, Centurion of the Arizona Spillway. So, you should know what position you are in....
translation: 我是鲁夫，亚利桑那溢洪道的百夫长。所以，你应该知道自己所处的位置...

original: Oh, I see the Mark of Caesar now. You must be that third-party that Caesar summoned.
translation: 噢，我看到凯撒的徽记了。你一定是凯撒召来的第三者。

original: I suppose I can answer questions.
translation: 我想我可以回答问题。

original: I'm just a friendly courier. Who are you?
translation: 我只是个友好的邮差。你是谁？

original: I see. I am Rufo, Centurion of the Arizona Spillway. Although, I would advise you to learn more about the Legion at the Fort and Malpais.
translation: 我明白了。我是鲁夫，亚利桑那溢洪道的百夫长。不过，我还是建议你多了解一下堡垒和马尔帕斯的军团。

original: This sector of the front is isolated from the rest of the front.
translation: 前线的这一部分与前线的其余部分是分开的。

original: I have the Mark of Caesar. I am taking the opportunity to learn about the Legion.
translation: 我有凯撒的徽记。我想借此机会了解一下军团。

original: That's good news, but unfortunately, I have nothing for you. This sector will likely not see combat until the battle for the dam continues.
translation: 这是个好消息，但很遗憾，我没有什么可以给你的。在大坝争夺战继续之前，这一地区可能不会出现战斗。

original: I am Rufo, Centurion of the Arizona Spillway.
translation: 我是鲁夫，亚利桑那溢洪道的百夫长。

original: I am here to serve the Legion.
translation: 我是来为军团服务的。

original: He deserted?
translation: 他逃跑了？

original: I'm looking for a deserter from Malpais by the name of Serratus.
translation: 我在找一个马尔帕斯的逃兵，他叫锡兰杜英。

original: A pity, but I understand. He's over there. My men will not interfere.
translation: 很遗憾，但我能理解。他在那里，我的人不会干涉的。

original: Sedonus has marked Serratus for death.
translation: 塞多尼乌斯已经把锡兰杜英标记为死亡。

original: Guarding this spillway, fool. My forces are preparing for the upcoming battle with the Profligates.
translation: 守着这个泄洪道，傻瓜。我的部队正在为即将到来的与放荡者的战斗做准备。

original: The NCR spread itself thin during exercises, and were weak to a night attack. Morons.
translation: NCR在演习中分散兵力，在夜袭面前不堪一击。白痴。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: Good question. I have been expecting this for the last week. I believe that doing so would require diverting enormous amounts of power.
translation: 好问题，我上个星期就盼着这个了。我认为，这样做将需要转移大量的电力。

original: The NCR must be refusing to do so due to political pressure. Their lack of discipline regarding and dependence on power will be their undoing.
translation: NCR一定是迫于政治压力而拒绝这么做的。他们缺乏纪律和对权力的依赖将导致他们的毁灭。

original: Why doesn't the NCR just open the spillway gates?
translation: 为什么NCR不直接打开泄洪道的闸门？

original: The exterior of the spillway is a poor defensive position. The NCR were fools to hold it for so long.
translation: 泄洪道的外部是一个糟糕的防御位置。NCR真是愚蠢，竟然坚持了这么久。

original: Lanius has recognized it as such, and he has so ordered a withdrawal from the space between the spillway and the Castra Legatus.
translation: 拉尼厄斯已经意识到了这一点，并下令从泄洪道和特使军营之间的地方撤退。

original: There aren't any Legionaries on the surface.
translation: 地面上没有任何军团士兵。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: No more questions.
translation: 没别的问题了。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: No more questions.
translation: 没别的问题了。

original: Legion guards and caravaneers have been removed in the area around Elephant Hill for the past three weeks.
translation: 在过去的三周里，象山附近的军团守卫和商队已经被撤离。

original: All reports indicate that it is a black demon, a Ranger.
translation: 所有的报告都表明那是一个黑恶魔，一个游骑兵。

original: Okay, I've completed the initial three bounties. What was the fourth one?
translation: 好了，我已经完成了最初的三个悬赏。第四个是什么？

original: AZBarkerConfrontation02Topic04
translation: 你是说我要进去就要先受辐射？

original: Yeah, well, forgive me if I don't believe you. Wait, what's that around your neck?
translation: 嗯，好吧，如果我不相信你，请原谅我。等等，你脖子上那是什么？

original: I really did just wander in here by accident.
translation: 我真的是无意中进来的。

original: The Ranger is in a cave to the south of here. I'll mark eet on ya map.
translation: 游骑兵在南边的一个山洞里，我会在地图上做个记号。

original: Fine. Here's your coin.
translation: 好吧。这是你的硬币。

original: Come back when you do.
translation: 有了再来找我。

original: I don't have that much.
translation: 我可没有那么多。

original: By Mars! This is.... The full reward will be dispensed at once. It's a pity that I don't have any further work for you.
translation: 玛尔斯在上！这是...全部奖金将立即发放。很遗憾，我没有进一步的工作给你了。

original: I have his armor.
translation: 我有他的盔甲。

original: A pity.
translation: 真遗憾。

original: <Lie.> I have no further proof.
translation: <说谎>我没有进一步的证据。

original: A pity.
translation: 真遗憾。

original: I have no further proof.
translation: 我没有进一步的证据。

original: Unacceptable. My Legionaries are precious. Every single one of them will be needed for the march on Hoover Dam.
translation: 无法接受。我的军团士兵很宝贵，他们每一个人都需要参加胡佛大坝的战役。

original: Go back and kill the Ranger.
translation: 回去杀了游骑兵。

original: No, but you have the location, so my work here is done.
translation: 没有，但你知道地点，所以我的工作结束了。

original: Of course not. You're a mercenary. You are expendable. I will not spare even a single Legionary. Let alone the entire cohort I would need to kill him.
translation: 当然不。你是个雇佣兵，你是可以牺牲的。我不会放过哪怕一个军团士兵，更不用说杀掉他所需要的所有人了。

original: Go back and kill the Ranger.
translation: 回去杀了游骑兵。

original: And I'm not precious?
translation: 我不珍贵吗？

original: Is that so? Let me be clear here. Go back and finish him, or your life is forfeit. This should be no issue for Caesar's chosen.
translation: 是这样吗？我先说清楚，回去杀了他，不然你就没命了。这对凯撒的选民来说应该不是问题。

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Good. Complete your duty and return to me.
translation: 好。完成你的任务，回到我这里来。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: Good.
translation: 好的。

original: Fine. I'll go back and kill him.
translation: 好吧，我会回去杀了他。

original: Legionaries! At arms!
translation: 军团士兵！拿起武器！

original: No, I'm not doing it, and that's final.
translation: 不，我不干，就这么定了。

original: Very well. You have served Caesar in other ways. I will consider our business at an end. Just know that I consider you a coward.
translation: 好吧，你也曾以其他方式侍奉过凯撒，我认为我们的交易就此结束。你要知道，我认为你是个懦夫。

original: No, I'm not doing it, and that's final.
translation: 不，我不干，就这么定了。

original: I know!
translation: 我知道！

original: I know.
translation: 我知道。

original: The NCR is still around, and your Rangers aren't.
translation: NCR还在，你的游骑兵却不在了。

original: Hmm.... What to say about it? It's the annihilation of our culture, our way of life. How's that for what I think about it?
translation: 嗯...该怎么说呢？这是对我们的文化，我们的生活方式的毁灭。我对它的看法如何？

original: I don't even consider it a treaty. How can it be a treaty when the NCR didn't hold their end of the stick?
translation: 我甚至不认为这是一个条约。当NCR没有履行他们的义务时，它怎么能成为一个条约呢？

original: I'm told that the NCR put a statue of us out west. Never been. Don't think I ever will. It'll probably just piss me off.
translation: 我听说NCR在西部建了一座我们的雕像。从来没去过，我想我永远也不会去。这可能只会让我生气。

original: Tell me about the Ranger Unification Treaty.
translation: 跟我说说游骑兵统一条约。

original: "The New California Republic, as represented by Chief Elise and Josh Hanlon, do solemnly swear to accept the Desert Rangers into the ranks of the NCR Rangers.
translation: “新加州共和国，由伊莉斯军士长和乔什·汉隆代表，郑重宣誓接受沙漠游骑兵加入NCR游骑兵队伍。"

original: In exchange for their agreement to follow orders from, and subordinate themselves to, the NCR, the NCR will hereby support to the Rangers.
translation: “作为他们同意服从NCR的命令并从属于NCR的交换，NCR将在此支持游骑兵。“

original: That's the preamble. I have the whole fucking thing memorized. Fat lot of good it does me. I don't think the NCR even read it.
translation: 这是序言，我他妈的都背下来了。这对我一点好处也没有，我觉得NCR根本没读过。

original: Somehow, we held up our end of the deal, and the other side didn't.
translation: 不知怎么的，我们遵守了协议，而对方却没有。

original: What is the treaty? Like, what's in it?
translation: 条约是什么？比如，里面有什么内容？

original: It's not for squeamish outsiders like you. But, I'll say this. His attempts to make new ghouls aren't through radiation.
translation: 不适合像你这样神经脆弱的外来者。但是，我要说的是，他制造新食尸鬼的尝试并不是通过辐射。

original: Sometimes, I think that.... Nevermind. Not like I can do anything while I'm here.
translation: 有时候，我觉得...算了，我在这里也做不了什么。

original: What type of eccentricities?
translation: 什么类型的怪癖？

original: What, Belle? Supposedly, some nutjob from Colorado eloped with her. Can't imagine anyone wanting to play with a smoothskin like you.
translation: 什么，贝儿？据说有个科罗拉多的疯子跟她私奔了，无法想象有谁想和你这样的滑皮一起玩。

original: Makes me sick just thinking about it.
translation: 想想就觉得恶心。

original: I have seen some of those new Born Ghouls the good doc trots around, though. They don't look "born" to me.
translation: 我倒是见过一些医生带着的新出生的食尸鬼。在我看来，他们并不是 "天生"的。

original: What happened to the ghoul girl you mentioned?
translation: 你说的那个食尸鬼女孩后来怎么样了？

original: Yeah, it is. I'm honestly surprised that a dumbass smoothskin even knows what New Mexico is, so good for you.
translation: 对，是的。我真的很惊讶一个蠢蛋竟然知道新墨西哥是什么，真不错。

original: Los Alamos is in New Mexico, right? I've been out that way before.
translation: 洛斯阿拉莫斯在新墨西哥州，对吧？我以前去过那里。

original: Just call it ABQ.
translation: 就叫ABQ好了。

original: What's an Alb...? An Albu.... An Albuq....
translation: 什么是阿尔巴...？阿尔布...阿尔布克...

original: Listen close. Only going to say this once. Albuquerque's got a crapton of names now. Albuquerque is its correct name.
translation: 仔细听，我只说一次。阿尔伯克基现在有一大堆名字，只有阿尔伯克基是正确的名字。

original: Since the city got overrun by tribals, it's been called Albosqkayqe. The final syllable can be said as "key," "kay" and "kuh".
translation: 自从这座城市被部落占领以来，它被称为Albosqkayqe。最后一个音节可以说成“key”、“kay”和“kuh”。

original: The people who lived there were lazy, and sometimes, they just called it "El Burque".
translation: 住在那里的人很懒，有时，他们就叫它“艾尔伯克”。

original: Legion took it over and is Latinizing it to "Albus Quercus," which is just a stupid name.
translation: 军团接管了它，然后把它的名字拉丁化为"阿尔布斯奎勒库斯"，这名字太蠢了。

original: Well, actually, sometimes the military still call it "High River". So, whatever.
translation: 嗯，实际上，有时军方仍然称其为“高河”。所以，无所谓了。

original: None of the other traders can keep up with all this shit. They just it call ABQ.
translation: 其他商人都跟不上这些破玩意，他们就叫ABQ。

original: Got all that, smoothskin?
translation: 明白了吗，滑皮？

original: Um, okay? But what is it?
translation: 呃，好吧？但它是什么呢？

original: Oh.... I once had a brother like you, before I was a ghoul.
translation: 噢...在我变成食尸鬼之前，我也有个像你这样的兄弟。

original: It's okay, kid. Just call it ABQ. I promise no one will make fun of you for it.
translation: 没事的，孩子。就叫ABQ吧，我保证没有人会因此而取笑你。

original: Me no understood.
translation: 我没搞懂。

original: No. Stick to calling it ABQ. Idiot.
translation: 不能。就叫ABQ吧，白痴。

original: So, ABQ is also called Albosq.... Albosqk.... I'm sorry, but can you go over it again?
translation: 所以，ABQ也叫阿尔伯斯...阿尔伯斯克...对不起，你能再说一遍吗？

original: Yeah, it isn't. Maybe, you're one of the good ones.
translation: 嗯，不是的。也许你是比较擅长的。

original: Makes sense to me. Albuquerque isn't that hard to say once you know how.
translation: 对我来说很有意义。只要知道怎么念，阿尔伯克基也没那么难说。

original: Are you interested now?
translation: 你现在感兴趣了？

original: About that job offer....
translation: 关于那份工作...

original: Go talk to my partner Beth. She'll give you the lot of displacer gloves -- if she's in a good mood.
translation: 去和我的搭档贝丝谈谈。如果她心情好，她会给你一堆置换拳套。

original: Sure.
translation: 当然。

original: Then, why did you ask?
translation: 那你为什么要问？

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Oh, it's this again. I don't have any need for unarmed weapons. The Praetorians already have enough ballistic fists.
translation: 噢，又来了。我不需要徒手武器，禁卫军已经有足够的暴怒钢拳了。

original: Why would we downgrade to inferior weapons?
translation: 我们为什么要降级使用劣质武器？

original: Hank and Beth sent me.
translation: 汉克和贝丝派我来的。

original: This again?
translation: 又是这个？

original: Hank and Beth sent me.
translation: 汉克和贝丝派我来的。

original: We already trade the space and comfort that guns provide for instilling inner strength that the blade gives us.
translation: 我们已经用枪支提供的空间和舒适感换取了刀剑赋予我们的内在力量。

original: Unarmed weapons are useless. And Displacer gloves? Profligate technology.
translation: 徒手武器毫无用处，还有置换拳套？堕落者的技术。

original: I've seen the Legion use melee weapons. Can't they use these?
translation: 我见过军团使用近战武器，他们不能用这些吗？

original: That's different.
translation: 那不一样。

original: Caesar wears one of these. I've seen it for myself.
translation: 凯撒就戴着这个，我亲眼所见。

original: They are parasites. They supply us the bare minimum as tribute. If only we had beaten them, then things would be different.
translation: 他们是寄生虫，他们只提供给我们最低限度的贡品。如果我们打败了他们，事情就会不同了。

original: What's your deal with them, anyways?
translation: 你和他们到底是怎么回事？

original: Eh, sure, why not? The market price for a Mark II BeatCo Hi-Power Displacer Glove is, the hell you wastelanders use, caps? 3,500 caps.
translation: 呃，当然可以，为什么不呢？BeatCoⅡ型高功率置换拳套的市场价格是，你们这些废土人用的是什么来着？3500瓶盖。

original: So, I'll give you a markdown for, I dunno, 3,200. More than fair.
translation: 那么，我给你打个折，大概3200吧。非常公平。

original: I want to buy a Displacer Glove.
translation: 我想买一个置换拳套。

original: Interested?
translation: 感兴趣？

original: I want to buy a Displacer Glove.
translation: 我想买一个置换拳套。

original: Great!
translation: 好极了！

original: Sure, I'll take it.
translation: 当然，我就要它了。

original: Well, then, come back when you do.
translation: 嗯，那就等你有了再来吧。

original: I am interested, but I don't have the money.
translation: 我很感兴趣，但是我没有钱。

original: Well, then, that's that.
translation: 好吧，那就这样吧。

original: Not interested.
translation: 不感兴趣。

original: The Reservation is surrounded by an invisible death that kills through the air.
translation: 保留地被一种无形的死亡包围着，它通过空气杀人。

original: They worked to spread it, contaminating our slave stock. So, we marched to stop them.
translation: 他们散播病毒，污染了我们的奴隶。所以，我们进军去阻止他们。

original: The air killed scores of our troops. The ghouls brought out thunder-shells that destroyed the ground.
translation: 天空杀死了我们几十名士兵，食尸鬼发射的雷弹摧毁了地面。

original: Of course, we did take control of the rail lines outside the toxic air. They couldn't leave, but we couldn't enter.
translation: 当然，我们确实控制了污染空气之外的铁路线。他们无法离开，但我们也进不去。

original: So, we negotiated a treaty. It won't last. This is obvious to everyone.
translation: 所以，我们谈判了一个条约。这不会持续太久的，这显而易见。

original: Beaten them in what?
translation: 打败他们什么？

original: It's difficult. None of the targets' exact locations are known to us. Well, except the caravan, they radioed in their position.
translation: 这很难，我们还不知道这些目标的确切位置。嗯，除了商队，他们用无线电报告了自己的位置。

original: So, tell me about my targets.
translation: 所以，告诉我我的目标是什么。

original: The only reason I'm humoring you is because of your personal service to Caesar.
translation: 我迁就你的唯一原因是你为凯撒效力。

original: Very well. Tell me something that the ghouls didn't.
translation: 很好，跟我说点食尸鬼没说的。

original: Look, this is a deal in which the Legion can only benefit. Just hear me out.
translation: 听着，这是一笔只会让军团受益的交易。听我说完。

original: I won't.
translation: 我没有。

original: Well, if you're interested at any point, I'll be here.
translation: 好吧，如果你有兴趣的话，随时都可以找我。

original: We have a stock of Power Fists that I'm reserving for the battle at Hoover Dam, but that's it.
translation: 我为胡佛大坝之战准备了一些动力拳套，但就这些了。

original: Unarmed is a special technique that requires time for specialized training that we simply do not have.
translation: 徒手是一种特殊的技巧，需要时间进行专门的训练，而我们根本没有时间。

original: Do you really not have any unarmed weapons in your stock at all? This is high-end equipment.
translation: 你的库存里真的没有任何徒手武器吗？这可是高端装备。

original: [SUCCESS] As a preventative measure? That argument has merit. I will purchase half of your lot.
translation: [成功]作为一种预防措施？这个观点有点道理。我会买你一半的货。

original: If you don't buy them, then they'll sell them to someone else, possibly outside the Legion.
translation: 如果你不买，他们就会卖给其他人，很可能是军团之外的人。

original: [FAILED] We're not in Santa Fe, and if it's such a great deal, then why haven't they sold it already? Not interested.
translation: [失败]我们又不在圣菲，如果真的很划算，那他们为什么还没卖出去？不感兴趣。

original: It's a great deal. Best in Santa Fe.
translation: 这真的很划算，这都是圣菲最好的货。

original: [SUCCESS] Ah.... Very well. The whole lot.
translation: [成功]啊...很好，所有的都要了。

original: We've already agreed that the gloves have merit. Why not the whole batch?
translation: 我们都认为拳套是有价值的，为什么不直接买整批？

original: [FAILED] Don't think you can browbeat me into submission like one of our slaves.
translation: [失败]别以为你能像吓唬奴隶一样吓我。

original: In fact, deal's off. Inform the corpses that I'm not interested. Any further attempts to sell here will be stopped.
translation: 准确的说，交易取消。告诉那些尸体我不感兴趣，任何在此出售的企图都将被阻止。

original: With force.
translation: 用武力。

original: It's the whole lot or nothing.
translation: 要么全买，要么全不买。

original: [SUCCESS] Is that really it? We've already practiced a number of those techniques for melee training.
translation: [成功]真的是这样吗？我们已经在近战搏击训练中练习了很多这些技巧。

original: The Centurions would be familiar with those, at least.
translation: 至少百夫长应该对这些很熟悉。

original: Very well. I will purchase half of your lot.
translation: 很好，我会买你一半的货。

original: I am very familiar with the use of unarmed weapons. The techniques are not so complicated. Observe.
translation: 我非常熟悉徒手武器的使用，这些技巧并不复杂。仔细观察。

original: [FAILED] Spoken as a man who has never been in close-quarters combat. Not interested.
translation: [失败]作为一个从未参加过近距离战斗的人来说，不感兴趣。

original: Look, you run up to the enemy and punch them. Not hard.
translation: 看，你跑到敌人面前，给他们一拳。不难。

original: No, you don't. Leave me alone.
translation: 不，你没有。离我远点。

original: I do have business acumen.
translation: 我确实有商业头脑。

original: I don't give a rat's ass who you know. Asshole.
translation: 我才不管你认识谁呢。混蛋。

original: Look here, bitch. I have a goddamn in with Caesar. Are you really going to throw that away?
translation: 听着，婊子。我跟凯撒有关系，你真的要扔掉吗？

original: The hell you are. You try that, and I will fry your ass into next Sunday.
translation: 你他妈谁啊。你敢试试，我让你看不到下周日的太阳。

original: I'm just going to steal the damn gloves and sell them myself. Make a nice deal with Hank.
translation: 我要去偷那该死的拳套然后自己卖掉，跟汉克好好做笔生意。

original: Dr. Clark give me strength.
translation: 克拉克博士，给我力量。

original: Are you really so deadset on this? I'll give you the damn gloves. Talk to the armorer. Name of Red Rivers. When you're done, go bother Hank.
translation: 你真的这么死脑筋吗？我把那该死的拳套给你，你去跟军械师谈谈。他叫红河，完事了去烦汉克吧。

original: Now, leave me alone!
translation: 现在，离我远点！

original: Except you can't do that. I have the Mark of Caesar. Killing me is off-limits.
translation: 但你不能这么做。我有凯撒的徽记，杀我是不允许的。

original: Very well. Inform the corpses that we have an accord.
translation: 很好，告诉尸体们我们达成协议了。

original: Half the lot works for me.
translation: 有一半对我有用。

original: I suppose I can make an exception for someone like you, but I am not happy about this.
translation: 我想我可以为像你这样的人破例，但我对此并不高兴。

original: I will purchase half of their stock. No exceptions.
translation: 我将购买他们一半的存货，没有例外。
