translation: 好吧，如果我不这样我的生意就做不下去了。

original: I'll let you in on a secret, just 'cause I like you so much. Legion has a contract with me, because they recognize great value when they see it.
translation: 我要告诉你一个秘密，就因为我很喜欢你。军团跟我签订了合同，因为他们发现了巨大的价值。

original: I come out here on a regular basis to make deliveries.  I'll be heading into Phoenix, so you better take advantage of these prices while they're hot!
translation: 我定期来这里送货。我要去凤凰城了，所以你们最好趁现在价格便宜！

original: Do you make a lot of sales?
translation: 你们的销售额高吗？

original: Those factories burn through slaves like nothing else, even my high-quality goods. But it isn't just them. Anyone who needs a quality workhand comes to me.
translation: 那些工厂对奴隶的摧残是其他任何地方都无法比拟的，即使是我的优质产品。但不仅仅是他们，任何需要优质工人的人都会来找我。

original: Your best business is in Phoenix?
translation: 你在凤凰城的生意最好？

original: None as good as me!
translation: 没有人能比得上我！

original: Other traders, though? No, not many. There aren't enough savages to support a large and competitive slaver economy.
translation: 不过，其他商人呢？不，不是很多。没有足够的野蛮人来支撑一个庞大的、有竞争力的奴隶经济。

original: The biggest slaver outfits make their catches on the edges of Legion territory, in Mexico and Texas.  Everyone else just combs the wastes for tribals the Legion missed.
translation: 最大的奴隶贩子组织在军团领地的边缘，在墨西哥和德克萨斯进行抓捕。其他人只是在废墟上搜寻军团遗漏的部落。

original: Are there other private slave traders in the Legion?
translation: 军团里还有其他的私人奴贩吗？

original: That's the million-denarii question! I can see you've got the spirit of a businessman.
translation: 这是一个价值百万第纳尔的问题！我看得出你很有商人的精神。

original: Townsfolk keep the money circulating. Without them, the economy would fall apart. Plus, why would I enslave some of my best customers?
translation: 市民们让货币保持流通，没有他们，经济将会崩溃。再说，我为什么要奴役我最好的客户？

original: Why don't slavers just enslave townspeople?
translation: 为什么奴隶贩子不直接奴役城镇居民？

original: Justify? I don't reckon there is anything to justify. Slavery gives purposes to the weak. It lifts them up and allows them to be a part of something greater than themselves.
translation: 证明？我不认为有什么好证明的。奴隶制给了弱者目标，鼓舞了他们，让他们成为比自身更伟大的事物的一部分。

original: Much better than living in squalor.
translation: 比生活在肮脏的环境里要好得多。

original: How can you justify selling people?
translation: 你如何证明卖人是合理的？

original: Trade secret, partner.
translation: 商业机密，伙计。

original: Where do you get these slaves?
translation: 你从哪儿弄来这些奴隶的？

original: [SUCCEEDED] Come on, there are a lot of tribals, even if I'm the only one who knows how to find them.
translation: [成功]拜托，部落还有很多，就算只有我知道怎么找到他们。

original: How can you capture enough slaves to maintain a contract with the Legion just by hunting tribals?
translation: 你怎么能仅仅通过狩猎部落就俘获足够多的奴隶来维持与军团的合约呢？

original: [FAILED] How about you stop mouthing off about things you don't understand, friend.
translation: [失败]朋友，你能不能别再对你不懂的事指指点点了。

original: What happens when you run out slaves to sell?
translation: 如果你没有奴隶可以卖了怎么办？

original: You wouldn't be impugning my good business here, would you? How about you start talking straight and get to your point.
translation: 你不会是在诋毁我的好生意吧？不如你开门见山，直奔主题吧。

original: To capture them all, you'd have to have an army of slavers big enough to rival the Legion. Do they all get a cut of the profit?
translation: 要想把他们全部拿下，你必须拥有一支足以与军团抗衡的奴隶大军。他们都能分到利润吗？

original: Tribals or not, slaves are slaves. Maybe I've managed to sidestep the business of hunting them down. So what?
translation: 不管是不是部落，奴隶就是奴隶。也许我已经成功回避了追捕他们的任务，那又怎样？

original: The efficiency of my operation is second to none. You know why? Because my slaves are born in captivity.
translation: 我的工作效率是首屈一指的。你知道为什么吗？因为我的奴隶是在囚禁中出生的。

original: You only need a few men and a few women. Keep them. You think I'm going to kill my golden goose?
translation: 你只需要几个男人和几个女人，留着他们就行。你觉得我会杀了我的金鹅吗？

original: I let them fuck. I keep them healthy. No harm is done to them. We've been doing it this way for years, before I even had hair on my chin.
translation: 我让他们干炮，我让他们保持健康，他们没有受到过任何伤害。我们这么做已经好几年了，那时我下巴上还没长毛呢。

original: Can you argue with the results?
translation: 你能对结果提出异议吗？

original: My point is that your story doesn't add up. How are you really getting these slaves?
translation: 我的意思是，你的说法不合常理。你到底是怎么弄到这些奴隶的？

original: Your master. Where is he?
translation: 你的主人。他在哪里？

original: Oh. That's the Mark of Caesar. I see. I suppose it's not my place to question Caesar's choice in tools.
translation: 噢，那是凯撒的徽记。原来如此，我想我没资格质疑凯撒对工具的选择。

original: Excuse me?
translation: 什么？

original: I am tending to this shrine. The sand and the winds do not treat it kindly.
translation: 我正在照看这座神庙，风沙对它并不友好。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: No, no, I didn't build it. Well, the pillows are my personal touch.
translation: 不，不，不是我造的。枕头是我的个人风格。

original: This shrine is here so soldiers and other travelers can feel closer to Mars.
translation: 这个神庙在这里是为了让士兵和其他旅行者感觉更接近玛尔斯。

original: We are so far from Flagstaff. It can be hard to remember His grace.
translation: 我们离旗杆市太远了，要记住他的恩典可能很难。

original: Why is this shrine here? Did you build it?
translation: 为什么这里会有神庙？是你造的吗？

original: You are truly interested? Very well.
translation: 你真的感兴趣吗？很好。

original: A Priestess named Sola made me her apprentice when I was nothing but a slave. I trained to be a Maiden under her guidance.
translation: 一位名叫索拉的女祭司，在我还是个奴隶的时候，就把我收为徒弟。我在她的指导下受训成为一名女侍。

original: Then, she died. No other Priestess would take me in, and I could hardly be a Maiden without a Priestess.
translation: 然后，她死了。没有其他的女祭司愿意收留我，没有女祭司，我很难成为一名女侍。

original: I felt lost for a time, forsaken by Mars. I begged for forgiveness.
translation: 我迷失了一段时间，被玛尔斯抛弃了。我乞求原谅。

original: Then, I learned of this shrine. It was vacant. Its previous caretaker had been murdered by a traveler.
translation: 后来，我听说了这座神庙。它是空的，它的前任管理员被一个旅行者谋杀了。

original: I knew Mars had taken pity on me. I have been here, serving Mars, ever since.
translation: 我知道玛尔斯同情我了。从那以后，我就一直在这里服侍玛尔斯。

original: Tell me about yourself.
translation: 和我说说你自己吧。

original: Sola's decision to sponsor me as a Maiden was controversial.
translation: 索拉提议我成为女侍的决定是有争议的。

original: My mother was a capture, a Profligate Ranger. My father was a degnerate raider. I am told it was a tragic accident that they met at all.
translation: 我母亲是个俘虏，一个放荡的游骑兵，我父亲是个堕落的掠夺者。我听说他们的相遇是一场悲惨的意外。

original: Think of it: a raider bests a Legion patrol and steals a slave for himself. Such a strange thing to happen.
translation: 想象一下：一个掠夺者击败了军团巡逻队，为自己偷走了一个奴隶。发生了这么奇怪的事。

original: The Legion eventually recovered my mother, pregnant. She later died during my birth.
translation: 军团最终救回了我怀孕的母亲，她后来在我出生的时候去世了。

original: As you can imagine, many of the women believed I was cursed.
translation: 你可以想象，很多女人认为我被诅咒了。

original: Why wouldn't any Priestesses take you in?
translation: 为什么没有女祭司收留你？

original: Mars is the architect of everything you see around you. The rocks, the plants, all of it is His creation.
translation: 火星是你周围一切事物的创造者。岩石，植物，所有的一切都是他创造的。

original: In return for having given us this world, Mars asks us to behave righteously and with good intention.
translation: 作为给予我们这个世界的回报，玛尔斯要求我们以正义和善意行事。

original: Who is Mars?
translation: 玛尔斯是谁？

original: To honor him. To purge the world of those who dishonor him.
translation: 尊崇他，清除世界上那些玷污他的人。

original: What, specifically, does Mars ask of you?
translation: 具体来说，玛尔斯要求你做什么？

original: "Road's closed?" You mean the Legion aren't letting anyone through?
translation: “道路封闭？”你是说军团不让任何人通过？

original: Ye really ain't heard? Ol' Chain-Way's bit the dust, she did. Big earthquake 'swhat I heard, but tain't what I woulda' guessed to be honest wi'cha.
translation: 你真的没听说吗？老连环道已经寿终正寝了啦，真的。我听到的是大地震哦，不过说实话，我猜不是这样的啦。

original: But, it don't make a lick o' difference to me why it went the way it did. All's I know is'at folks don't come round no more on account o' it.
translation: 不过咧，事情为什么会变成这样哦，对我来说一点也不重要啦。我知道的就是说，人们不再来这里了哦。

original: Yeah, I know. I had a great view of that shitshow while the geckos were chewing my leg off.
translation: 是啊，我知道。 蜥蜴把我的腿咬断的时候我看得一清二楚。

original: Wait, uh... Wha'd'ya mean? Where ye comin' from, anyway?
translation: 等一下，呃...你是什么意思啦？话说回来，你到底是哪里来的？

original: Damn! I thought the Legion would have finally gotten rid of you ugly fucks.
translation: 该死！我还以为军团终于可以摆脱你们这些丑陋的家伙了。

original: Whoa...! Heheheh, now how's that a way to greet a friendly face out here where friends're so few? I'm jus' tryin' to make a livin'.
translation: 哇哦...！嗬嗬嗬，在这种朋友这么少的地方哦，这算什么友好的问候方式啊？ 我只是想"混"口饭吃而已啦。

original: Wait, but the road south *is* open then?
translation: 等等，那南边的路是开放的吗？

original: Uh.... Yup, last I heard. But then ye'd know better than I would, wouldn'cha? Where ye comin' from, anyway?
translation: 呃...是啦，我最后听说的啦。但你会比我更清楚，对不对啦？话说回来，你到底是哪里来的？

original: My apologies. I didn't mean to hurt your feelings, my good man.
translation: 我很抱歉。我不是有意伤害你感情的，我的好兄弟。

original: S'okay. I understand ye come a long way only to be stuck wich'is ol' ghoul. Why don'cha stay awhile and enjoy the cool air?
translation: 好的啦。我知道你远道而来却被一个老尸鬼困住了哦。你为什么不多待一会儿，享受一下凉爽的空气呢？

original: And ye can take a shower and git that nasty stink outta ye, ye stupid, ugly smoothskin son'a'a'bitch! Heheheh now that don't feel so good, do it kid?
translation: 你可以去洗个澡啦，把身上的臭味弄掉哦，你这又蠢又丑的狗娘养的滑皮！ 嗬嗬嗬，现在感觉不太好了吧，孩子？

original: You won't get any business from me, you stinking old zombie creep. I'm getting out of here.
translation: 我不会跟你做生意的，你个臭僵尸。我要离开这里。

original: Hmph. Good riddance, asshole. Don't bother crawling back.
translation: 哼。总算解脱了，混蛋。别费劲爬回来了哦。

original: I heard it was sabotage.
translation: 我听说是破坏活动。

original: I doubt et. I've seen et all. Rangers long gone. And thees Support Unit Hoover? Haven't seen them in years.
translation: 我对此表示怀疑，我什么都见过了。游骑兵早就走了，胡佛支援小队？很多年没见了。

original: Don know that et mit have been. Seems like everythin's fallin' apart these days.
translation: 我不知道我们曾经有过什么。这年头好像一切都崩坏了。

original: Then what are you still doing out here? This some kind
translation: 那你还在这里干什么？这些

original: Vegas.
translation: 维加斯。

original: You crossed the 'Rado? Must 'ave some powerful friends.
translation: 你穿过了无线电？你一定有一些有权有势的朋友。

original: Goodsprings.
translation: 清泉镇。

original: Neva' heard o' it.
translation: 涅瓦听到了。

original: That's none of your business.
translation: 那与你无关。

original: Malpais.
translation: 马尔帕斯。

original: Another bounty hunter. Tellin' ya now. I got no alcohol.
translation: 又一个赏金猎人。我现在就告诉你，我没有酒。

original: Dolan Springs.
translation: 多兰泉。

original: Oh... I suppose I should'a guessed as much.
translation: 噢...我想我应该猜到了啦。

original: The south.
translation: 南方。

original: Okay... where in the south?
translation: 好啦...南边的什么地方哦？

original: Uh... Alright then. Keep yer secrets.
translation: 呃...好嘛。保守你的秘密哦。

original: The north.
translation: 北方。

original: Pardon me? Thought I jus' heard ye say ye came from the north.
translation: 你说什么？我刚才听到你说你是从北方来的哦。

original: The grave.
translation: 坟墓。

original: Well... I hate to be the one to tell ye this, but'cha must 'ave come full circle. This here's *my* grave! And by the smell of ye, it'll be yer's too.
translation: 嗯...我不愿意告诉你这些，但你肯定是绕了一个圈子。这里是我的坟墓！从你的气味来看，也会是你的。

original: I know all about it... Just need a drink.
translation: 我都知道了...我只想喝一杯。

original: Oh, say no more, friend. What can I get'cha?
translation: 噢，别再说了啦，朋友。你想要点什么？

original: I'm not really in the mood to chat, ghoul.
translation: 我现在没心情聊天，食尸鬼。

original: Heheheh, okay then. So then what *are* ye in the mood fer, smoothskin?
translation: 嗬嗬嗬，那好哦。那么你现在想要什么呢，滑皮？

original: Sure thing, kid. Here's what I got.
translation: 没问题啦，孩子。这是我有的。

original: I'd like to open a tab.
translation: 我想开个帐单。

original: Take a looksie.
translation: 看看咯。

original: Show me what you got.
translation: 让我看看你有什么。

original: Ain't much, but it's better than nothin'.
translation: 虽然不多啦，但总比什么都没有强。

original: What do you have to drink?
translation: 你有什么喝的？

original: Bear. I'm the leader of the Rusty Hooks. I ensure our contract with the Legion continues smoothly.
translation: 大熊。我是锈钩帮的头头，我保证我们和军团的合同顺利进行。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: The name is Bear. I'm the second-in-command here. I handle our contact with the Legion, trade negotiations, and generally make sure everyone is on the same page.
translation: 我的名字叫大熊，我是这里的二把手。我负责与军团的联系，贸易谈判，确保所有人都能达成一致。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I used to provide security for a trade outfit called Los Alamos Co-op. I suppose I got bored of that, so I quit.
translation: 我以前给一个叫洛斯阿拉莫斯合作社的贸易组织当保安。我想我已经厌倦了，所以我辞职了。

original: Eventually, I met Kyle, and he made me an offer I couldn't refuse. I've been with him ever since.
translation: 最终，我遇到了凯尔，他给了我一个我无法拒绝的条件。从那以后我就和他一起混了。

original: How did you end up here?
translation: 你是怎么到这来的？

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Understand that most of your kind are afraid of Super Mutants. Even those who say they have no problem with us still shrivel up when they meet us face-to-face.
translation: 要知道你们大多数人都害怕超级变种人。即使是那些说他们对我们没有意见的人，当他们与我们面对面时，仍然会退缩。

original: Legionaries are the only ones who don't get scared. Some of them tell me I'm an abomination. Others ask me about my workout regimen. None of them have ever given me that awful look of fear.
translation: 只有军团士兵才不会害怕。有些人说我是个可恶的家伙，还有人问我的锻炼方法。但他们从来没有给过我那种害怕的恐惧表情。

original: Does the Legion have a problem with you being a Super Mutant?
translation: 军团对你是超级变种人没意见吗？

original: We do whatever they ask. We're not exactly in a privileged position, so saying 'no' isn't an option.
translation: 他们让我们做什么我们就做什么。我们并不完全处于特权地位，所以说“不”不是一个选项。

original: What kind of work do you do for the Legion?
translation: 你为军团做什么工作？

original: Well, what do you think?
translation: 嗯，你觉得呢？

original: Kyle and Sid certainly won't make it. Me, I'll die one way or another. Jillian might be alright, she's knowledgable enough to be an asset, but chances aren't great.
translation: 凯尔和锡德肯定撑不过去。我呢，无论如何都会死的。吉莉安可能还好，她的知识足够让她成为线人，但可能性不大。

original: To put it bluntly, we're already in the process of our own extermination. I can only prolong our usefulness and hope for the best.
translation: 说白了，我们已经在自我毁灭的过程中了。我只能尽可能延长我们的作用，希望能有好的结果。

original: Don't tell the others I said that, though. Jillian always gets moody about it and I don't want to upset her.
translation: 不过，别告诉其他人我这么说过。吉莉安对此总是闷闷不乐，我不想让她难过。

original: Plus, Kyle broke our generator last time the topic came up. It was a pain to fix.
translation: 另外，上次提到这个话题的时候凯尔弄坏了我们的发电机。修理起来很痛苦。

original: What happens if you stop doing work for the Legion?
translation: 如果你不再为军团工作了呢？

original: Sid told you?
translation: 锡德告诉你的？

original: Please listen carefully: you cannot tell anyone else about this. Kyle may seem foolish to you, but he is cunning.
translation: 请仔细听好：你不能把这件事告诉任何人。凯尔可能在你看来很蠢，但他其实很狡猾。

original: It's not just me in danger now, it's Sid, and you too.
translation: 现在危险的不只是我，还有锡德，还有你。

original: Sid told me about the bomb Kyle planted in your heart.
translation: 锡德跟我说了凯尔在你心脏里放炸弹的事。

original: Yes?
translation: 是的？

original: About your heart bomb...
translation: 关于你心脏上的炸弹...

original: I was a caravan guard in New Mexico. The Rusty Hooks ambushed us one day, and I fought back.
translation: 我在新墨西哥州当过商队警卫。有一天，锈钩帮伏击了我们，我反击了。

original: I must've killed six of them, but they had riddled me so full of bullets that I passed out.
translation: 我肯定杀了其中六个人，但他们把我打得千疮百孔，我昏过去了。

original: When I came to, I felt this pressure in my chest, like a cage around my heart. Kyle was standing over me.
translation: 当我醒过来的时候，我感到胸口有一种压力，就像一个笼子包围着我的心脏。凯尔站在我跟前。

original: He told me that he had planted a bomb inside me, and that he could detonate it whenever he wanted. But if I were to become his protector, his guard dog, he'd let me live.
translation: 他告诉我，他在我体内安置了一颗炸弹，他可以随时引爆它。但如果我成为他的保护者，他的看门狗，他会让我活下来。

original: I know life as a mutant probably doesn't seem like much to you smoothskins, but I didn't want to die. I still don't.
translation: 我知道变种人的生活对你们滑皮来说可能没什么意义，但我不想死。我还是不想死。

original: Wait, how did Kyle manage to put a bomb inside you?
translation: 等等，凯尔是怎么在你体内放炸弹的？

original: You think I haven't thought of that? If his heart stops beating, the bomb detonates. It uses some sort of radio frequency.
translation: 你以为我没想过吗？如果他心脏停止跳动，炸弹就会引爆。它使用某种无线电频率。

original: And even failing that, the rest of the Hooks would kill me for trying to start a mutiny. Kyle may be stupid, but he's still the leader.
translation: 就算没爆炸，锈钩的其他人也会因为我想造反而杀了我。凯尔也许很蠢，但他还是老大。

original: Why don't you just kill Kyle?
translation: 你为什么不杀了凯尔？

original: Back before my time, the Rusty Hooks used to do a thing called a pack fight.
translation: 在我还没来的时候，锈钩帮经常进行一种叫帮斗的活动。

original: A Hook would challenge the gang's current leader to a one-on-one fight, and the winner would take the throne.
translation: 一个钩子将挑战该团伙的现任领导人并进行一对一的战斗，获胜者将获得王位。

original: If we could briefly disable the bomb frequency somehow, I could challenge him to a pack fight and win leadership of the Hooks.
translation: 如果我们能以某种方式短暂地屏蔽炸弹频率，我就可以挑战他，与他进行一场帮斗，并赢得锈钩的领导权。

original: And if Kyle dies in our fight, I wouldn't have to worry about the bomb ever again. It would be a tragic accident. It's what happens when a human fights a Super Mutant.
translation: 如果凯尔在我们的战斗中死亡，那我就再也不用担心炸弹了。这将是一场悲惨的意外，是人类与超级变种人战斗的结果。

original: Then how do we get rid of Kyle?
translation: 那我们怎么除掉凯尔？

original: Kyle is the muscle and the brains behind the operation. I just keep his workload light. Things function best that way.
translation: 凯尔是整个行动的主谋，我只是帮他减轻工作量。这样事情运行得最好。

original: Sounds like you do the work of a first-in-command.
translation: 听起来你在做一把手的工作。

original: Jillian. Is there a reason you're bothering me?
translation: 吉莉安，你来烦我有什么原因吗？

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: I'm an engineer. You know, mechanical equipment, old tech, stuff like that.
translation: 我是工程师。你知道的，机械设备，老技术，诸如此类的东西。

original: What do you do around here?
translation: 你在这儿是干嘛的？

original: Actually, yes. The Legion scavenges a lot of tech that they don't know how to get working.
translation: 实际上，很大。军团收集了很多他们不知道如何使用的科技。

original: They buy from those ghouls in New Mexico, too. And the necrotic shitheads aren't going to fix the stuff that breaks, so it becomes our job.
translation: 他们也从新墨西哥的食尸鬼那里买。这些大脑坏死的白痴不会去修复坏掉的东西，所以这就成了我们的工作。

original: Are engineers in high demand in Legion territory?
translation: 军团领土上的工程师需求量大吗？

original: The Reservation.
translation: 保留地。

original: They're mostly arms dealers, but they're slavers and religious fanatics too. Fucking animals.
translation: 他们大多是军火商，但也有奴隶贩子和宗教狂热分子。该死的畜生。

original: Ghouls in New Mexico?
translation: 新墨西哥的尸鬼？

original: Well, how about the fact that they put an explosive collar around my neck?
translation: 嗯，如果他们在我脖子上套了个爆炸项圈呢？

original: I swear, if Caesar marched in there and crucified them all, the world would be better for it.
translation: 我发誓，如果凯撒冲进去把他们都钉死在十字架上，世界会因此变得更美好。

original: What's your problem with The Reservation?
translation: 你对保留地有什么意见？

original: We've known each other since we were kids in El Burque. Joined a gang together and hit the wastes. Had a couple years of fun before Caesar showed up.
translation: 我们还是孩子的时候在阿尔伯克基就认识了。一起加入帮派，四处闯荡。在凯撒出现之前，我们玩了几年。

original: When The Reservation put a collar around my neck, it was Kyle who tracked me down and ambushed the caravan. Not even the big mutant scared him off.
translation: 保留地给我套上项圈的时候，是凯尔跟踪我伏击了商队。即使是大变种人也没能把他吓跑。

original: How did you come to know Kyle?
translation: 你是怎么认识凯尔的？

original: Kyle did what?
translation: 凯尔做了什么？

original: No... I can't. I won't.
translation: 不...我不能。我不会。

original: Did Bear tell you why he joined the Rusty Hooks? He was guarding the Reservation slaver caravan that was transporting me to my new owner.
translation: 大熊告诉你他为什么加入锈钩帮了吗？他当时在看守着把我送到新主人那里的保留地奴隶商队。

original: He may be a nice guy now, but what if it's a lie? What if he's just waiting for the chance to kill us all?
translation: 也许他现在是个好人，但如果那是谎言呢？万一他只是在伺机杀光我们呢？

original: Kyle put a bomb in Bear's heart. Can you defuse it?
translation: 凯尔在大熊的心脏里放了颗炸弹。你能拆除吗？

original: What?
translation: 什么？

original: About Bear's heart bomb...
translation: 关于大熊心脏上的炸弹...

original: Fuck. Fucking hell. What about Kyle?
translation: 操，真他妈见鬼。那凯尔呢？

original: You know Bear well enough to know that he wouldn't hurt you.
translation: 你很了解大熊，知道他不会伤害你。

original: Alright.
translation: 好的。

original: Nevermind.
translation: 没关系。

original: What? Fuck off.
translation: 什么？滚蛋。

original: Just because Bear is a Super Mutant doesn't mean he's a savage. Some of them are good!
translation: 大熊是个超级变种人并不意味着他就一定是个野蛮人。有些还是不错的！

original: Jesus Christ. Fine. Alright. I'll do it.
translation: 老天在上，很好。好吧，我来做。

original: We'll do it in my shop
translation: 我们在我店里弄。

original: <Lie> Bear won't hurt Kyle.
translation: <说谎>大熊不会伤害凯尔的。

original: A pack fight? That's ancient history. We haven't done that sort of thing since Byrd.
translation: 帮斗？那是古老的历史了。伯德之后我们就没做过这种事了。

original: And... fuck! Just look at them. Bear is three times Kyle's size. A pack fight will kill him!
translation: 而且...操！看看他们，大熊的体型是凯尔的三倍。帮斗会要了他的命！

original: Bear wants to invoke a pack fight and take Kyle's throne.
translation: 大熊想发动一场帮斗，夺取凯尔的王位。

original: Then figure something out. I won't let Kyle die because of some stupid mistake he made years ago.
translation: 那就想办法。我不会让凯尔因为几年前犯的愚蠢错误而死。

original: I don't know.
translation: 我不知道。

original: No.
translation: 不。

original: Look, I can't do it. If Bear is gonna fight Kyle, I won't disarm his bomb.
translation: 听着，我做不到。如果大熊要和凯尔决斗，我不会拆除他的炸弹。

original: Kyle is important to me, and I won't let Bear fuck it all up just because he can't abide by servitude.
translation: 凯尔对我很重要，我不会因为大熊无法忍受奴役就把一切都搞砸。

original: I'm sorry.
translation: 我很抱歉。

original: Is there a way to keep Bear from killing Kyle?
translation: 有什么办法能让大熊不杀凯尔吗？

original: Sure. Lemme take a look.
translation: 当然可以。让我看看。

original: Can you repair my stuff?
translation: 你能修我的东西吗？

original: Mostly tools and parts.
translation: 主要是工具和零件。

original: Do you have anything to trade?
translation: 你这儿有什么东西卖吗？

original: I guess I got you figured all wrong, then.
translation: 看来我完全看错你了。

original: I'm Kyle, and this is my crew. We're the Rusty Hooks.
translation: 我是凯尔，这是我的团队。我们是锈钩。

original: It was granted to me by Caesar.
translation: 这是凯撒赐予我的。

original: We're a gang. Stick-ups, robberies, caravan raids, ransoms. Everything a gang does.
translation: 我们是一个帮派。抢劫，掠夺，商队袭击，勒索。帮派会做的一切。

original: Used to hang around New Mexico, on the outskirts of Albosqkayqe.
translation: 过去常在新墨西哥的阿尔波凯奇郊区闲逛。

original: Who are the Rusty Hooks?
translation: 锈钩是谁？

original: The ABQ, man. I think the Legion's calling it Albus Quercus now.
translation: 阿尔伯克基，老兄。我想军团现在管它叫白橡树(Albus Quercus)了。

original: Wait, Albosqkayqe?
translation: 等等，阿尔波凯奇？

original: Less useful ones, sure.
translation: 没什么用的一个，当然。

original: I thought the Legion destroyed gangs.
translation: 我以为军团消灭了帮派。

original: What do *you* do around here?
translation: *你*在这里做什么？

original: We do anything that needs doing. If the Legion can't handle it, we take care of it. Slave recovery, tech wizardry, repairs, retrofits.
translation: 我们做任何需要做的事。如果军团处理不了，就交给我们。奴隶恢复，技术魔法，修理，翻新。

original: You know what an RobCo encabulator is? No, you probably don't, and the Legionaries don't either. But I do. That's why they come to me.
translation: 你知道RobCo增压机是什么吗？不，你可能不知道，军团也不知道。但我知道，这就是他们来找我的原因。

original: What do you do around here?
translation: 你在这儿是干嘛的？

original: Oh, that's Bear. He's my second-in-command.
translation: 哦，那是大熊。他是我的副手。

original: He's a beast, even for a Super Mutant. I once saw him fight two deathclaws off with only his bare hands. Even killed one of them.
translation: 即使作为超级变种人来说，他也是一头野兽。我曾经看到他赤手空拳打跑了两头死亡爪，甚至杀了其中一头。

original: He's the only person here with enough sense to respect me as a leader. Whatever I want, he makes happen. So don't cross me, or Bear will fuck you up.
translation: 他是这里唯一一个有足够理智，尊重我领导地位的人。无论我想要什么，他都能实现。所以别跟我作对，否则大熊会毁了你。

original: What's the deal with the super mutant?
translation: 那个超级变种人是怎么回事？

original: Fuck no I don't. Do I look like Alice McFlannerty? Go bother Sid about that shit.
translation: 我他妈才没有呢。我长得像爱丽丝·麦克弗兰纳蒂吗？去烦锡德吧。

original: Do you have anything to trade?
translation: 你这儿有什么东西卖吗？

original: Well, yeah, I could. But I'm not going to. Maybe Sid will, or Jillian. Get them to do your chores. I'm busy running a gang.
translation: 嗯，是的，我可以，但我不打算这么做。也许锡德会，或者吉莉安会，让他们来帮你做家务。我正忙着管理一个帮派。

original: Can you repair some of my stuff?
translation: 你能修好我的东西吗？

original: Probably because the high-level strategic shit I'm doing mentally is just too much for you to grasp. It's called multi-tasking. Now fuck off.
translation: 可能是因为我脑子里想的那些高级战略对你来说太难理解了，这就是所谓的多任务处理。现在滚吧。

original: You don't look very busy.
translation: 你看起来不太忙。

original: Whatever, man.
translation: 没关系，老兄。

original: Sorry for asking.
translation: 抱歉打扰了。

original: They're fine.
translation: 他们很好。

original: I'm not gonna shit on the hand that feeds me. They pay on time and in full. That's as close as I'll ever get to being gainfully employed.
translation: 我可不会在喂养我的手上拉屎。他们按时足额付款，这是我最接近有报酬的工作了。

original: What do you think of the Legion?
translation: 你对军团怎么看？

original: Different than it is now, I guess.
translation: 我想和现在不一样吧。

original: Before the Legion, our leader was a guy named Byrd. He had this big fat iron hook where his left hand was supposed to go.
translation: 在加入军团之前，我们的领袖是一个叫伯德的家伙。他本应是左手的地方挂着个大铁钩。

original: Things were looser. We could smoke and get high. Byrd didn't give a shit.
translation: 一切都变得松散。我们可以抽烟嗑药，伯德根本不在乎。

original: We'd hit caravans, rob farmsteads. One of my favorite things to do was something we called slavejacking.
translation: 我们袭击商队，抢劫农场。我最喜欢做的事情之一是我们称之为“奴隶抢劫”的活动。

original: Slavery is huge in El Burque. Someone was always delivering slaves somewhere. We'd find a good spot to lay low, then pop an ambush.
translation: 在阿尔伯克基，奴隶制盛行，总有人在某地运送奴隶。我们要找个隐蔽的好地方，然后设个埋伏。

original: Bam bam, pop pop. Guards are dead and the cargo is ours. We deliver it and get the money.
translation: 嘭嘭，砰砰，警卫都死了，货物是我们的了。我们送过去，拿到钱。

original: Can't do something like that anymore, though. Not if you like your head attached to your body.
translation: 但我不能再做这样的事了，如果你还喜欢头和身体连在一起的话。

original: What was life like before the Legion?
translation: 加入军团之前的生活是怎样的？

original: The Legion killed him.
translation: 军团杀了他。

original: It's actually funny in hindsight, because I was gonna kill him myself. I had it all planned out. Bear was going to back me up and everything.
translation: 事后想想还挺有趣的，因为我本来想亲手杀了他。我什么都计划好了，大熊会支持我的一切。

original: When the Legion cornered us, they covered Byrd in gasoline and burned him. They asked the rest of us why we shouldn't get the same treatment.
translation: 当军团把我们逼入绝境时，他们在伯德身上浇了汽油，然后烧死了他。他们问我们其他人为什么我们不应该得到同样的待遇。

original: I was the only one who spoke up. I don't even remember what I said, but they seemed pleased. I guess that's why we're alive.
translation: 我是唯一一个站出来说话的人，我甚至不记得我说了什么，但他们看起来很高兴。我想这就是我们活着的原因。

original: What happened to Byrd?
translation: 伯德怎么了？

original: Fuck them. Degenerate losers.
translation: 操他们的，堕落的失败者。

original: Jillian's the only one I can stand. Sid's a moron. Bear is totally wrapped around my finger.
translation: 我能忍受的只有吉莉安。锡德是个白痴，大熊完全被我玩弄于股掌之间。

original: The rest of these losers are still raiders at heart. It's a miracle the Legion didn't enslave them, or worse.
translation: 剩下的失败者本质上还是掠夺者。军团没有奴役他们或者更糟，真是个奇迹。

original: How do you feel about the other Rusty Hooks?
translation: 你觉得其他锈钩怎么样？

original: Sid.
translation: 锡德。

original: Look, I'm really not the guy you want to talk to. Talk to Kyle, or Bear.
translation: 听着，我真的不是你想找的人。跟凯尔或大熊谈谈。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Honestly, I mostly just hold a gun and look scary.
translation: 说实话，我通常只是拿着枪，看起来很吓人。

original: I used to do repairs, but Jillian's way better at that stuff.
translation: 我以前是做维修的，但吉莉安做得比我好多了。

original: What do you do around here?
translation: 你在这儿是干嘛的？

original: Yeah, sure! I can probably find something around here worth selling.
translation: 嗯，当然！我应该能在这附近找到一些值得出售的东西。

original: Do you have anything to trade?
translation: 你这儿有什么东西卖吗？

original: I just asked. Byrd told me to prove my worth, so I robbed a pawn shop. I brought back the loot and he said welcome aboard.
translation: 我只是问问而已。伯德让我证明自己的价值，所以我抢劫了一家当铺。我把赃物带回来，他说欢迎加入。

original: Things were easier back then. We drank and smoked and fucked.
translation: 那时候的生活比较简单。我们喝酒，抽烟，打炮。

original: God, I miss it.
translation: 天啊，我真怀念。

original: How did you join the Rusty Hooks?
translation: 你是怎么加入锈钩帮的？

original: I don't know. It's easy to say I hate them, but maybe we deserve them.
translation: 我不知道。说我恨他们很容易，但也许是我们罪有应得。

original: We're just dumbshit raiders. We always have been. We robbed people, killed people.
translation: 我们只是些愚蠢的掠夺者，我们一直都是。我们抢劫，杀人。

original: Then the Legion shows up and tells us we can't do it anymore. They hang the old leader from a cross and put Kyle in charge.
translation: 然后军团出现了，告诉我们不能再这么做了。他们把老首领吊死在十字架上，让凯尔掌权。

original: Now things are safer, and we can't hurt people anymore.
translation: 现在安全多了，我们不能再伤害别人了。

original: How do you feel about the Legion?
translation: 你对军团有什么看法？

original: I don't know what guilt is. I just do what it takes to survive, and it turns out that surviving isn't so great.
translation: 我不知道什么是罪恶感。我只是尽我所能活下来，而事实证明，活下来也并不是那么美好。

original: Do you feel guilty about being a raider?
translation: 你觉得作为一名掠夺者有罪恶感吗？

original: So?
translation: 那么？

original: You're expressing some thoughts that are dangerously close to suicidal ideation.
translation: 你表达了一些非常接近自杀的想法。

original: Alright.
translation: 好的。

original: Nevermind.
translation: 没关系。

original: Yeah, you're right. Everything sucks, forever. Just gotta get over it.
translation: 嗯，你说得对。一切都很糟糕，永远如此。只要克服它就好。

original: Life is hard. Suck it up and move on.
translation: 生活很艰难。接受现实，继续前进。

original: You want to listen to some junkie complain? 'Boo-hoo, I can't do jet anymore because the Legion would kill me.' That's what you want?
translation: 你想听什么瘾君子抱怨吗？“呜呜，我不能再磕杰特了，因为军团会杀了我的。”这就是你想要的吗？

original: We're chest-deep in shit. Kyle's been going through withdrawals for four months, Jillian is getting old, and Bear's a fucking walking timebomb.
translation: 我们都深陷泥潭。凯尔已经戒毒四个月了，吉莉安也老了，大熊他妈的是个活定时炸弹。

original: We're fucked. Once Jillian gets too old and ugly for the Legion, that's it. They're going to fucking kill us and we'll deserve it.
translation: 我们完蛋了。一旦吉莉安对军团来说又老又丑，那就完了。他们会杀了我们，这是我们应得的。

original: If you want to talk about it, I'm all ears.
translation: 如果你想聊聊，我洗耳恭听。

original: What? I don't remember that.
translation: 什么？我怎么不记得。

original: What was that you said about Bear being a timebomb?
translation: 你说大熊是个定时炸弹是怎么回事？

original: Fucking stupid motherfucker can't shut up. I just can't shut up.
translation: 他妈的这个傻逼怎么就是闭不上嘴呢，我就是闭不上嘴。

original: Bear has a bomb in his chest. Is that what you wanted to know?
translation: 大熊的胸口有个炸弹。这就是你想知道的吗？

original: I remember it.
translation: 我记得。

original: I put it there.
translation: 我放的。

original: Haha, wow! That's a weight lifted off my shoulders.
translation: 哈哈，哇哦！这让我如释重负。

original: I put it there, right next to his heart. Kyle told me to, so I did.
translation: 我放的，就在他的心脏旁边。凯尔让我这么做的，我就这么做了。

original: How did that happen?
translation: 这是怎么回事？

original: Because Bear is a massive Super Mutant and Kyle wanted him on our side.
translation: 因为大熊是一个巨大的超级变种人，凯尔想让他站在我们这边。

original: Obviously, we couldn't just ask him. Kyle isn't really a people person.
translation: 显然，我们不能直接问他。凯尔不太喜欢与人打交道。

original: Can we stop talking about this? It's better left forgotten.
translation: 我们能不谈这个了吗？最好把它忘了。

original: Why did Kyle want you to put a bomb in Bear's chest?
translation: 凯尔为什么要你在大熊胸口放炸弹？

original: Truly? That would be excellent!
translation: 真的吗？那就太好了！

original: Let's do it without delay.
translation: 让我们立即行动吧。

original: Given your physiology, it should be easy enough to remove the bomb from your chest.
translation: 根据你的生理机能，把炸弹从你胸口取出应该很容易。

original: No, that's okay. We'll think of something else.
translation: 不，没关系。我们再想想别的办法。

original: I can try taking the bomb out, if you want. How hard can it be?
translation: 如果你愿意，我可以试着把炸弹取出来。这能有多难？

original: If you can manage that, it would be the perfect opportunity to initiate a pack fight.
translation: 如果你能做到这一点，这将是发起帮斗的绝佳机会。

original: I can create a frequency jammer for the bomb with a sensor module and some scrap electronics.
translation: 我可以用传感器模块和一些电子废料为炸弹制造一个频率干扰器。

original: Take all the time you need.
translation: 随时都可以。

original: I have the sensor module and the scrap electronics. Let's create a bomb jammer.
translation: 我拿到了传感器模块和电子废料，我们来制造一个炸弹干扰器。

original: You said you'd need a sensor module and some scrap electronics.
translation: 你说你需要一个传感器模块和一些电子废料。

original: What did I need for the bomb jammer again?
translation: 炸弹干扰器需要什么来着？

original: Uh, no. I don't think it does. I'd prefer not to bet my life on tin foil.
translation: 呃，不，我不这么认为。我可不想把命押在锡纸上。

original: Doesn't tin foil block frequencies? We can try that.
translation: 锡箔难道不能干扰频率吗？我们可以试试。

original: There are only two people in this camp who would know how to disarm the bomb. Jillian and Sid.
translation: 这个营地里只有两个人知道如何解除炸弹。吉莉安和锡德。

original: Jillian doesn't know about the bomb, but if you tell her, she should be easy enough to convince. I hope.
translation: 吉莉安不知道炸弹的事，但如果你告诉她，她应该很容易被说服。我希望如此。

original: Sid put the bomb in there, but I don't know if he knows how to disarm it. He's unreliable. If he revealed the bomb's existence to you, he must be feeling guilty. Use that.
translation: 炸弹是锡德安放的，但我不清楚他是否知道怎么拆除，他不可靠。但如果他向你透露了炸弹的存在，他一定很内疚。利用这一点。

original: Go talk to them and see if you can't find a way to convince them.
translation: 去和他们谈谈，看看你是否能找到说服他们的方法。

original: Oh, and thank you. I appreciate it. Truly.
translation: 哦，还有谢谢你。我很感激，真的。

original: So we just need to disarm the bomb long enough for the pack fight. How do we do that?
translation: 所以我们只需要干扰炸弹足够长的时间来进行帮斗。我们该怎么做呢？

original: Okay.
translation: 好吧。

original: Let me think about it some more.
translation: 让我再考虑一下。

original: Me? I don't know how!
translation: 我？我不知道怎么拆！

original: I put it in there a long time ago. I was so fucking high that it felt like I could touch numbers. There's no way I'll be able to figure it out now.
translation: 我很久以前放的。我当时嗑药磕得太他妈嗨了，感觉都能摸到数字了。我现在不可能弄明白了。

original: If you really want me to do it, you need to get me some chems. Three boxes of mentats... and an amp of jet. That should be enough.
translation: 如果你真想让我这么做，你得给我弄点药。三盒曼他特...还有一箱杰特。这应该够了。

original: But you won't be able to find that shit easily. Not in Legion territory.
translation: 但你不会那么容易找到的，军团的地盘上没有。

original: I need you to disarm Bear's heart bomb.
translation: 我需要你解除大熊的心脏炸弹。

original: Thank fucking god.
translation: 谢天谢地。

original: Okay, give me a little while and I'll see what I can get working.
translation: 好吧，给我点时间，我看看能找到什么办法。

original: I have your jet and mentats.
translation: 我有你要的杰特和曼他特。

original: Three boxes of mentats and some fucking jet! You want Bear's heart bomb disabled, go get me the chems. Hurry! I'm salivating just thinking about it.
translation: 三盒曼他特和一箱杰特！你想拆除大熊的心脏炸弹，就去给我拿药来。快点！一想到它我就流口水。

original: What did I need to do again?
translation: 我还需要做什么来着？

original: That's... unfortunate.
translation: 这...真不幸。

original: Leaving Kyle alive is not an option. As long as he's alive, he'll be able to detonate the bomb in my heart.
translation: 让凯尔活着是不可能的。只要他还活着，他就能引爆我心脏里的炸弹。

original: If I'm ever to be free, Kyle needs to die. He dies during the pack fight, while the bomb is disarmed. I won't accept anything else.
translation: 如果我想重获自由，凯尔必须死。他在帮斗中死亡，炸弹也被拆除，别的我都不接受。

original: Jillian won't disarm your heart bomb unless you promise not to kill Kyle.
translation: 除非你保证不杀凯尔，否则吉莉安不会拆除你的心脏炸弹。

original: She did well. She couldn't disable it permanently, but she managed to jam it for a time. We have an opening.
translation: 她做得很好。 她没能让它永久失效，但她成功地干扰了它一段时间。我们有机会了。

original: How did Jillian do with the bomb?
translation: 吉莉安是怎么处理炸弹的？

original: I whipped up a jammer for the bomb's radio frequency, but it won't last forever. In the meantime, I recommend finding a doctor to get that thing out of him.
translation: 我做了一个炸弹无线电频率干扰器，但它不能一直使用。同时，我建议找个医生把那东西取出来。

original: Let's begin.
translation: 开始吧。

original: Are you ready for the pack fight?
translation: 你准备好参加帮斗了吗？

original: Kyle! I refuse to tolerate being your slave any longer. I challenge you to a pack fight.
translation: 凯尔！我再也不能忍受做你的奴隶了。我向你发起帮斗的挑战。

original: What the fuck are you talking about? Are you forgetting your place here? I own you. You are my puppet.
translation: 他妈的你在说什么？你忘了自己在这里的位置了？我拥有你，你是我的傀儡。

original: Not anymore.
translation: 不再是了。

original: Who the fuck told you that?
translation: 谁他妈告诉你的？

original: Is it true that you put a bomb in Bear's chest?
translation: 你真的在大熊的胸膛里放了颗炸弹吗？

original: Yeah right. I'll have to pay that little fuck a visit and remind him what that kind of accusatious bullshit does for group cohesion.
translation: 是的，没错。我得去拜访一下那个小混蛋提醒他这种指责性的屁话对团队凝聚力有多大影响。

original: Uh... not Sid.
translation: 呃...不是锡德。

original: What-the-fuck-ever. You bring that up again, and you're not walking out of this camp alive.
translation: 这他妈又怎么了。你再提起这件事，你就别想活着离开这个营地。

original: Nobody told me anything. I just have good intuition.
translation: 没人告诉我任何事，只是我的直觉很准。

original: You're going to believe that loser? Give me a break.
translation: 你要相信那个废物吗？饶了我吧。

original: Sid.
translation: 锡德。

original: This is the Solitare internment camp.
translation: 这里是索利泰尔拘留营。

original: Or do you mean the town? It too is Solitare.
translation: 或者你指的是小镇？这也是索利泰尔。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: All of our caravans pass through this town on their way to the Fort. Presently, you could say its importance is in flux.
translation: 我们所有的商队在去堡垒的路上都会经过这个小镇。目前，你可以说它的重要性在不断变化。

original: Our best Scribonii have moved here from Malpais so as to monitor transport along the highway more closely, though our regional command still resides in Malpais.
translation: 我们最好的书记官已从马尔帕斯搬到了这里，以便更密切地监测公路沿线的交通情况，但我们的地区指挥部仍在马尔帕斯。

original: I'm of the opinion that we should abandon Malpais altogether in favor of Solitare. Malpais brings us bad luck.
translation: 我的意见是，我们应该完全放弃马尔帕斯，转而选择索利泰尔。马尔帕斯会给我们带来厄运。

original: Does Solitare play a big role in the Legion's war effort?
translation: 索利泰尔在军团的战争中扮演的角色重要吗？

original: nkn
translation: 嗯。

original: Our best Scribonii have moved here from Malpais so as to monitor transport along the highway more closely, though our regional command still resides in Malpais.
translation: 我们最好的书记官已从马尔帕斯搬到了这里，以便更密切地监测公路沿线的交通情况，但我们的地区指挥部仍在马尔帕斯。

original: I'm of the opinion that we should abandon Malpais altogether in favor of Solitare. Malpais brings us bad luck.
translation: 我的意见是，我们应该完全放弃马尔帕斯，转而选择索利泰尔。马尔帕斯会给我们带来厄运。

original: Does Solitare play a big role in the Legion's war effort?
translation: 索利泰尔在军团的战争中扮演的角色重要吗？

original: I am Dominicus Rex. I am suboptio to this region's optio, who serves a veteran centurion.
translation: 我是多米尼库斯·勒克斯。我是这个地区的执行官副手，他侍奉一位资深的百夫长。

original: In other words, I am the third most senior commander of the 480 men who hold this town and its surrounding area.
translation: 换句话说，我是控制这个城镇及其周边地区的480名士兵中的第三级指挥官。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Purging Solitare of its rot.
translation: 净化索利泰尔的腐朽。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: Dissidents. Rebellion. Some weeks ago, two Rangers launched an operation from inside the town.
translation: 异见者，叛乱。几周前，两名游骑兵在镇上发起了一次行动。

original: It was my job to figure out how this happened. How did they get here? Who harbored them?
translation: 我的工作就是弄清楚事情是怎么发生的，他们是怎么到这里来的？谁窝藏了他们？

original: When I received my answers, I delivered judgment.
translation: 当我得到答案的时候，我做出了判断。

original: What rot is there in Solitare?
translation: 索利泰尔有什么腐朽的？

original: Ever since the interview, as I have told you, Solitare has been a beacon of stability and order. Yes, I can safely say it.
translation: 自从那次采访之后，正如我说过的，索利泰尔已经成为了稳定和秩序的灯塔。是的，我可以放心地说。

original: The rot has been purged.
translation: 腐败已经清除。

original: Has the "rot" been purged yet?
translation: “腐败”被清除了吗？

original: Cleaning up the last of the rot. As I promised, order has been restored.
translation: 清理最后的腐败，正如我所承诺的，秩序已经恢复。

original: What are you doing here?
translation: 你在这干嘛？

original: Yes. I create results for my Legion.
translation: 是的，我为我的军团创造成果。

original: So you killed all these people?
translation: 所以这些人都是你杀的？

original: We already spoke on this. You made your stance clear.
translation: 我们已经谈过这个问题了，你已经表明了自己的立场。

original: You killed all of these people?
translation: 这些人都是你杀的？

original: Good. Then we can meet as equals on this issue.
translation: 很好，那么我们就可以平等地讨论这个问题了。

original: I understand why you did what you did.
translation: 我能理解你为什么那么做。

original: Coward.
translation: 懦夫。

original: If you do not have a cause you would kill for, you are nothing more than an animal.
translation: 如果你没有一个你愿意为之杀人的理由，你就只不过是一只动物。

original: You didn't have to kill innocent people just because of two Rangers' actions.
translation: 你没必要因为两个游骑兵的行为而杀害无辜的人。

original: They are those who withheld information pertaining to the Rangers, or otherwise impeded our investigation.
translation: 他们隐瞒了与游骑兵有关的信息，或者妨碍了我们的调查。

original: They will be enslaved and sent somewhere far from here.
translation: 他们会被奴役，送到离这里很远的地方。

original: Who are those people in the cage?
translation: 笼子里的那些是什么人？

original: For your sake, I will assume you mean Sedonus, and not the Burned Man.
translation: 为你着想，我猜你指的是塞多尼乌斯，而不是那个被烧伤的人。

original: He is fine. He will be replaced by Lanius soon regardless.
translation: 他很好。无论如何，他很快就会被拉尼厄斯取代。

original: What do you think of the Malpais Legate?
translation: 你觉得马尔帕斯特使怎么样？

original: Just because you were granted an interview in the past does not give you the right to ask these questions.
translation: 你在过去获得了采访机会并不意味着你有资格问这些问题。

original: What do you think of the Malpais Legate?
translation: 你觉得马尔帕斯特使怎么样？

original: Just because you were granted an interview in the past does not give license to ask that question now.
translation: 你在过去获得了采访机会并不意味着你现在有资格问这些问题。

original: The Burned Man is nothing but a failure. That is all.
translation: 火烧人就是个失败者，仅此而已。

original: Who is the Burned Man?
translation: 火烧人是谁？

original: Fascinating question. I play chess with anyone who will have me: Decani, Frumentarii, our Optio.
translation: 有趣的问题。我和任何愿意跟我下棋的人下棋：什长、特务、我们的执行官。

original: One can say what they will about the Frumentarii, but facing them in a game of strategy makes it clear that they operate on a level above most men.
translation: 人们可以随意对特务说三道四，但在战略游戏中面对他们，就能清楚地看到他们的行动水平高于大多数人。

original: What do you like to do for fun?
translation: 你喜欢做什么消遣？

original: No, it doesn't interest me. It can tell us nothing of strategy, only that the man with the best cards wins.
translation: 不，我不感兴趣。它不能告诉我们什么策略，只会告诉我们牌最好的人赢。

original: Do you play caravan?
translation: 你玩大篷车扑克吗？

original: I sure do! Take a look.
translation: 我当然有！看看吧。

original: Do you have anything to trade?
translation: 你这儿有什么东西卖吗？

original: This is Solitare. Before the Legion came, we mostly traded in water, since we're so close to the river.
translation: 这里是索利泰尔。在军团来之前，我们主要靠水贸易，因为我们离河很近。

original: Now, we're more of a defensive fortification.
translation: 现在，我们更像是防御工事。

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: Oh. Legion. Some people got uppity again. It happens sometimes. Just gotta try to keep your head down.
translation: 哦，军团，有些人又嚣张起来了。这种情况时有发生，你只要低调点就行了。

original: There were some executions. Torture, too. Most of it took place in that big building under the watch of a soldier named Dominicus Rex.
translation: 有些人被处决了，还有酷刑。大部分都是在那栋大楼里发生的，在一个叫多米尼库斯·勒克斯的士兵的监视下。

original: Look, as long as you focus on your own business, you should be fine.
translation: 听着，只要你专注于自己的业务，你就不会有事的。

original: The town looks like it was attacked. What happened?
translation: 这个小镇看起来像是被袭击过。发生了什么事？

original: Boy, you're curious.
translation: 小子，你好奇心真重。

original: There were some Rangers. Two of them. I guess they must've been hiding here for a while.
translation: 有几个游骑兵，两个吧。我猜他们一定在这里藏了一段时间了。

original: One day, gunshots started going off. Legionaries started running. It went on for days. Gunfire and bombs and screaming.
translation: 有一天，枪声开始响起，军团士兵开始奔跑。这种情况持续了好几天，枪声，炸弹和尖叫。

original: The Rangers were dug in, slipping from alley to alley. You couldn't go outside 'cause you might get shot, or step on a mine.
translation: 游骑兵们挖好了洞，从一条巷子溜到另一条巷子。你不能出去，因为你可能会中枪，或者踩到地雷。

original: Eventually it stopped. I guess the Rangers ran outta ammo. One of 'em lit himself on fire. The other blew himself up.
translation: 最终它停了下来。我猜游骑兵的弹药用光了，其中一个自焚了，另一个引爆了自己身上的炸弹。

original: And that was the end of it.
translation: 事情就这样结束了。

original: What caused the Legion to crack down on the town like this?
translation: 军团为什么要对小镇进行这样的镇压？

original: Um. Thank you?
translation: 嗯，谢谢你？

original: The old owner, Roddy, got killed some weeks ago. It just made the most sense for me to take over.
translation: 原来的主人，罗迪，几周前被杀了。让我接手是最合理的选择。

original: You seem a little young to be running a store.
translation: 经营商店的话你似乎有点年轻。

original: Not a whole lot, I'm afraid.
translation: 恐怕不是很多。

original: Everyone's still kinda shaken by the Legion's executions. Don't know if it's okay to try and go back to the way things were.
translation: 大家还在为军团的处决感到震惊，我不知道是否可以试着回到以前的生活。

original: If you want to take a load off and relax, I'd really recommend heading south to Dolan Springs.
translation: 如果你想放松一下，我建议你往南去多兰泉。

original: What is there to do around town?
translation: 在镇上有什么可做的？

original: Then leave.
translation: 那快走吧。

original: I haven't yet.
translation: 我还没有。

original: What's with the blood, the Profligate asks.
translation: 这血是怎么回事，浪荡子问道。

original: It is the blood of my worthless Adjutant.
translation: 这是我那没用的副官的血。

original: Profligate, do you want a job?
translation: 浪荡子，你想要一份工作吗？

original: What's with the blood everywhere?
translation: 为什么到处都是血？

original: Now you're interested? Fine.
translation: 现在你有兴趣了？很好。

original: Find my Adjutant. He is somewhere in this camp. Go to him. And when you get to him...
translation: 去找我的副官，他就在这个营地的某个地方，去找他吧。当你找到他时...

original: Punch his lights out.
translation: 一拳打爆他的头。

original: What was that job you wanted me to do?
translation: 你想让我做什么工作？

original: Look at you! Such an eager little tent servant. Yes, there is something.
translation: 看看你！真是个热心的小帐篷仆人。是的，有。

original: Find Malachi. He should be in the market just south of camp. Give him this invoice.
translation: 找到玛拉基。他应该在营地南边的市场，把这张发票给他。

original: Is there anything else you need done?
translation: 你还有什么需要做的？

original: It is right.
translation: 会合适的。

original: Find my Adjutant. He is somewhere in this camp. Go to him. And when you get to him...
translation: 去找我的副官，他就在这个营地的某个地方，去找他吧。当你找到他时...

original: Punch his lights out.
translation: 一拳打爆他的头。

original: If the pay is right.
translation: 如果报酬合适的话。

original: He's a trader. One of the few who hasn't given us trouble. Punctual, attentive, acquiescent.
translation: 他是个商人，为数不多的没有给我们添麻烦的人。准时，专注，顺从。

original: If others were like him, we might have... I don't know.
translation: 如果其他人也像他一样，我们可能会...我不知道。

original: I would certainly be less frustrated.
translation: 我当然就不会那么沮丧了。

original: Before I go, who is Malachi?
translation: 在我走之前，问一下玛拉基是谁？

original: The Profligate knows its place.
translation: 浪荡子很有分寸。

original: Find my Adjutant. He is somewhere in this camp. Go to him. And when you get to him...
translation: 去找我的副官，他就在这个营地的某个地方，去找他吧。当你找到他时...

original: Punch his lights out.
translation: 一拳打爆他的头。

original: Sure. Anything to make myself useful.
translation: 当然。只要能让我有用就行。

original: Good.
translation: 好的。

original: I'll go find Malachi.
translation: 我去找玛拉基。

original: Then we have nothing to discuss.
translation: 那我们就没什么好谈的了。

original: Sorry, not interested.
translation: 对不起，没兴趣。

original: Perfect! Excellent. Did I say I would pay you? I can't recall.
translation: 完美！太好了。我说过我会付你钱吗？我想不起来了。

original: Oh well. Here. Spend it wisely.
translation: 哦好吧，给你。明智地使用。

original: I punched your Adjutant.
translation: 我打了你的副官。

original: Fuck.
translation: 操。

original: Well, I appreciate that you're making yourself useful.
translation: 嗯，我很感激你能帮上忙。

original: If you've questions, ask them. Otherwise, make yourself scarce.
translation: 如果你有问题，问他们。否则，让自己消失。

original: Malachi is dead.
translation: 玛拉基死了。

original: Thank you. Here, some more denarii.
translation: 谢谢你。给，还有一些第纳尔。

original: I see you're a Profligate with some sense.
translation: 我看你是个有点理智的浪荡子。

original: If you've questions, ask them. Otherwise, make yourself scarce.
translation: 如果你有问题，问他们。否则，让自己消失。

original: I delivered that invoice to Malachi.
translation: 我把发票交给玛拉基了。

original: I am Legatus Marcellus Sedonus.
translation: 我是马塞卢斯·塞多尼乌斯特使。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Yes. Your confusion is palpable.
translation: 是的。你的困惑显而易见。

original: I take it you've heard of Legatus Lanius. Lanius is the Princeps Legatus of the entire Legion.
translation: 我想你听说过拉尼厄斯特使吧，拉尼厄斯是整个军团的最高统帅。

original: I am the legatus of the Legio currently in the Mojave.
translation: 我是目前在莫哈维的军团的特使。

original: You're a Legate?
translation: 你是特使？

original: If that is how your feeble Profligate mind needs to perceive it, then yes, that is correct.
translation: 如果这就是你软弱、堕落的头脑所需要的感知方式，那么是的，这是正确的。

original: Lanius is the Legate, and I am a legate.
translation: 拉尼厄斯是特使，我也是特使。

original: So, you are a legate, but you're not the Legate?
translation: 所以，你是一名特使，但你又不是拉尼厄斯那种特使？

original: Fine.
translation: 很好。

original: Can I ask you some questions about the Legion's military?
translation: 我可以问你一些关于军团军队的问题吗？

original: Very well. A Legio is a fighting force of 6,000 men. That would be 12 Cohorts, plus auxiliary units.
translation: 很好。军团是一支6000人的战斗部队，总共有12个步兵大队，外加辅助部队。

original: Cohorts are led by veteran Centurions. Cohorts are divided into ten Centuria, which are led by lesser Centurions.
translation: 步兵大队由老兵百夫长率领。一个步兵大队分为10个百人队，由次等百夫长带领。

original: There are ten Decani in a Centuria, and each one leads eight men.
translation: 一个百人队有十名什长，每名什长带领八个人。

original: Can you explain Legion military hierarchy to me?
translation: 你能给我解释一下军团的军事等级制度吗？

original: Few. Only the most distinguished are elevated to the position and given their own Legion.
translation: 很少。只有最杰出的人才能晋升到这个职位，并拥有自己的军团。

original: Rest assured, Legatus Lanius is *the* Legatus. All Legions fall under his command.
translation: 请放心，拉尼厄斯特使就是拉尼厄斯特使，所有军团都听从他的指挥。

original: And when another legate fails, it is Lanius who steps in and corrects his mistakes.
translation: 当另一个特使失败时，是拉尼厄斯介入并纠正了他的错误。

original: How many legates are there?
translation: 有多少个特使？

original: The position was granted to me after my victories during the Prescott-Sedona campaign.
translation: 这个职位是我在普雷斯科特-塞多纳战役中获胜后得到的。

original: Unlike all other ranks within the Legion, to become Legatus, you must be chosen personally by Caesar. I was chosen.
translation: 不像军团中的其他军衔，要成为特使，你必须由凯撒亲自挑选。我被选中了。

original: How did you become a legate?
translation: 你是怎么成为特使的？

original: Gladly. I was newly a veteran Centurion, and had just assumed leadership of Cohors IV.
translation: 很乐意。那时我刚刚成为一名老兵百夫长，并担任第四大队的领导。

original: The Legion had taken Flagstaff earlier that year. Caesar set his sights south. He wanted Phoenix.
translation: 军团在那年的早些时候占领了旗杆市。凯撒把目光投向了南方，他想要凤凰城。

original: The towns of Prescott and Sedona had joined together so as to prevent our advance. Six different tribes and militias with a common cause: stopping us.
translation: 为了阻挡我们前进，普雷斯科特和塞多纳两个城镇联合在一起。六个不同的部落和民兵都有一个共同的目标：阻止我们。

original: We took Sedona with ease. The enemy retreated into Woodchute Mountain, near the town of Jerome. I refused to follow.
translation: 我们轻而易举地拿下了塞多纳，敌人撤退到杰罗姆镇附近的伍德丘特山。我拒绝跟随。

original: Instead, I took Montezuma, Camp Verde, and Dewey-Humboldt. Then we took Prescott.
translation: 相反，我选择了蒙特祖玛、坎普维德和杜威洪堡。然后我们拿下了普雷斯科特。

original: Finally, we went through Woodchute Mountain, coming from the west. By the time we arrived, the Profligates had no will left to fight.
translation: 最后，我们从西边穿过了伍德丘特山。我们到达的时候，这些放荡者已经没有反抗的意志了。

original: They meant to be an impassable wall. They waited for us to spring their trap, while we were already in their towns.
translation: 他们的本意是成为一道无法逾越的墙，他们等着我们踏入他们的陷阱，而我们已经进入了他们的城镇。

original: It took only thirty days to break this six-tribe coalition. When I met Caesar at Sedona, he named me Legatus Sedonus.
translation: 仅用了30天就打破了这六个部落的联盟。当我在塞多纳遇到凯撒时，他晋封我为塞多尼乌斯特使。

original: Tell me about the Prescott-Sedona campaign.
translation: 跟我说说普雷斯科特-塞多纳战役。

original: Leading my men.
translation: 带领我的人。

original: What will you be doing during the Battle of Hoover Dam?
translation: 胡佛水坝战役期间你会做什么？

original: Fuck you. You are less than dirt, Profligate. If it weren't for that Mark you have, I would kill you where you stand.
translation: 去你妈的，你这个比泥土还卑微的浪荡子。如果不是因为你身上的徽记，我会当场杀了你。

original: Caesar knows my value. He understands my strength. If this camp is small, it is only because he knows larger camps don't suit me.
translation: 凯撒知道我的价值，他了解我的力量。如果这个营地很小，那只是因为他知道更大的营地不适合我。

original: Why is a decorated legate such as yourself commanding such a small camp?
translation: 为什么像你这样一个功勋卓著的特使要指挥这么小的营地？

original: Do not say another word.
translation: 不要再说了。

original: Mars give me strength.
translation: 玛尔斯赐予我力量。

original: It is only because Caesar protects you, that your innards are not spilling into the sand right now.
translation: 只是因为凯撒保护了你，你的内脏现在才不会溅到沙子里。

original: Or maybe Caesar doesn't think you're that valuable at all.
translation: 或者凯撒根本不觉得你有什么价值。

original: Legionaries.
translation: 军团士兵。

original: Have you ever considered that you might just be an old man past his prime?
translation: 你有没有想过你可能只是个过了壮年的老人？

original: Hmph.
translation: 哼。

original: Sorry. I didn't mean anything by it.
translation: 对不起，我没有别的意思。

original: This is Malpais Legionary Camp.
translation: 这里是马尔帕斯军团营地

original: What is this place?
translation: 这是什么地方？

original: Fine.
translation: 很好。

original: Can you tell me about Malpais again.
translation: 你能再跟我说说马尔帕斯吗？

original: Do not speak that name, worm.
translation: 不要谈论那个名字，小虫。

original: This camp is established on the site of Malpais Flattop Mesa.
translation: 这个营地建立在马尔帕斯平顶方山的遗址上。

original: Wait, Malpais like the Malpais Legate?
translation: 等等，马尔帕斯指的是马尔帕斯特使吗？

original: Are you stupid?
translation: 你是傻逼吗？

original: Why have any Legion camps at all?
translation: 为什么要有军团营地？

original: Why have another Legion camp so close to the Fort?
translation: 为什么要在离堡垒这么近的地方再建一个军团营地？

original: What do you mean, history? This is a military camp. It has been since 2277.
translation: 你说什么，历史？这里是个军营，自2277年以来一直如此。

original: When the previous legate lost Hoover Dam, Malpais was left behind. Now, we have returned.
translation: 当前任特使失去胡佛水坝时，马尔帕斯被留下了。现在，我们回来了。

original: What's the history of Malpais?
translation: 马尔帕斯的历史是怎样的？

original: No. It used to, when this region was less civilized, but not anymore.
translation: 不。以前是这样，当时这个地区还没那么文明，但现在不是了。

original: All of the other Legion camps in the area operate adjunct to this one, as satellite camps. The logistics happen here.
translation: 该地区所有其他的军团营地都是作为这里的卫星营地运作的。后勤工作在这里进行。

original: Traders taking the Chainway north also stop here. We purchase some of our slaves that way.
translation: 沿连环道向北走的商人也在这里停留。我们用这种方式购买了一些奴隶。

original: Does Malpais see a lot of action?
translation: 马尔帕斯有很多行动吗？

original: The Chainway is the overpass west of here. It collapsed some time ago.
translation: 连环道是这里西边的立交桥，不久前倒塌了。

original: Wait, what's the Chainway?
translation: 等等，连环道是什么？

original: I drank them. They help me focus.
translation: 我喝的，它们帮助我集中注意力。

original: What's with all the soda bottles around your tent?
translation: 你帐篷里这么多汽水瓶子是怎么回事？

original: Yes. He was the field commander of Legio I, but also of the Legion.
translation: 是的。他是第一军团的战地指挥官，也是整个军团的指挥官。

original: When Legio II was established and given to me, the Malpais Legate retained seniority, and thus had the final say over my Legion.
translation: 当第二军团成立并交给我时，马尔帕斯特使保留了优先权，因此他对我的军团有最后的决定权。

original: Did you ever work with the Burned Man?
translation: 你和火烧人一起工作过吗？

original: Fierce. His devotion to Mars was uncompromising. He seemed to revel in conquest. To kill gave him life.
translation: 狂热，他对玛尔斯的忠诚是毫不妥协的。他似乎陶醉于征服，杀戮给了他生命。

original: What was the Burned Man like?
translation: 火烧人是什么样的人？

original: Do not question Caesar's judgment. If he believed Lanius was the best man for the job, then it is so.
translation: 不要质疑凯撒的判断。如果他相信拉尼厄斯是最合适的人选，那就没错。

original: Why weren't you made Caesar's second-in-command when the Burned Man failed?
translation: 火烧人失败后，你为什么没被任命为凯撒的副手？

original: Enough! If you are trying to goad me into some sort of reaction, you will be sorely disappointed.
translation: 够了！如果你试图刺激我做出某种反应，你会非常失望的。

original: I am content with my place here at Malpais. When Lanius arrives, he will assume command of Legio II and secure victory.
translation: 我对我在马尔帕斯的位置很满意。当拉尼厄斯到来后，他将接管第二军团的指挥权，并确保胜利。

original: It seems like you were skipped over for the promotion. You really aren't jealous at all?
translation: 看来你在升职的时候被忽略了。你真的一点都不嫉妒吗？

original: I have served the Legion for nearly three decades. I have met many Legionaries.
translation: 我为军团服务了近三十年，我见过许多军团士兵。

original: Perhaps I crossed paths with the Legionary who is now Lanius. If I had, I wouldn't know.
translation: 也许我遇到过现在叫拉尼厄斯的军团士兵。如果有，我也不会知道。

original: The man of the mask, though? No, I have never met him.
translation: 那个戴面具的人呢？不，我从未见过他。

original: Have you ever met Legate Lanius?
translation: 你见过拉尼厄斯特使吗？

original: I am Blackfoot. I met Caesar and Graham before they discovered Mars' purpose for them. In turn, they showed me my purpose.
translation: 我来自黑脚。在凯撒和格拉汉姆发现玛尔斯对他们的意义之前，我遇到了他们。 反过来，他们也让我明白了我的目标。

original: What tribe are you from originally?
translation: 你来自哪个部落？

original: Didn't think that anybody in the NCR knew that there were Rangers out east before that damn treaty.
translation: 在那该死的条约签订之前，我觉得NCR里没人知道东部有游骑兵。

original: I guess you're one of the good ones. You can stay. Keep away from the gated section. I've rigged it with traps.
translation: 我猜你是好人之一，你可以留下来。远离门控区，我装了陷阱。

original: [NCR Rep] That armor.... You're from before the Ranger Unification Treaty, aren't you?
translation: [NCR声望]那件盔甲...你是游骑兵统一条约之前的人，对吧？

original: Ha! I wish. No secret mission. I appreciate that you recognized the armor though.
translation: 哈！但愿如此。没有秘密任务，不过我很感激你认出了我的盔甲。

original: Listen closely. Stay away from the gate. Very dangerous.
translation: 仔细听好。离大门远点，非常危险。

original: [NCR Rep] You're an Arizona Ranger, aren't you? Are you on a secret mission to kill Caesar?
translation: [NCR声望]你是亚利桑那游骑兵，对吧？你在执行刺杀凯撒的秘密任务吗？

original: Fine.
translation: 很好。

original: I'd like to ask about something else.
translation: 我想谈谈其他事。

original: Ow! What the fuck?!
translation: 喔！搞什么鬼？！

original: <Punch him in the nose.>
translation: <一拳打在他鼻子上>

original: Thanks, partner! You run along now.
translation: 谢谢，搭档！你快走吧。

original: I have an invoice for you from Marcellus Sedonus.
translation: 我有一张马塞卢斯·塞多尼乌斯给你的发票。

original: Very well. Speak to me when your business here is concluded and your belongings will be returned to you.
translation: 很好。等你办完这里的事，你的东西会还给你的。

original: Sure, here you go.
translation: 当然，给你。

original: Very well. Speak to me when your business here is concluded and your belongings will be returned to you.
translation: 很好。等你办完这里的事，你的东西会还给你的。

original: <Keep holdout weapons> Sure, here you go.
translation: <留下藏匿的武器> 当然，给你。

original: Very well. Speak to me when your business here is concluded and your belongings will be returned to you.
translation: 很好。等你办完这里的事，你的东西会还给你的。

original: <Keep holdout weapons> Sure, here you go.
translation: <留下藏匿的武器> 当然，给你。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: Nevermind, I'm not going in the camp.
translation: 没关系，我不去营地了。

original: I'll keep that in mind.
translation: 我会记住的。

original: No wonder you're so cranky all the time. Soda is bad for your health!
translation: 怪不得你总是这么暴躁，汽水对你的健康有害！

original: You think you're educated just because you can deduce things?
translation: 你以为你受过教育就因为你会推理？

original: I serve Caesar. I have and will until I die. Whatever I put in my body is between me and the latrine.
translation: 我侍奉凯撒，过去是，将来也是，直到我死。 无论我往身体里放什么，都是我和厕所之间的事。

original: Quick temper, binge-drinking sugary sodas... Are you nursing an addiction?
translation: 脾气暴躁，嗜饮含糖苏打水...你上瘾了？

original: You have no proof of anything.
translation: 你没有任何证据。

original: I don't think Caesar would like to hear that one of his legates is an addict.
translation: 我觉得凯撒不会愿意听到他的特使是个瘾君子。

original: Hah.
translation: 哈哈。

original: Put yourself in my position. You're a soldier, a commander. Well-respected. Important.
translation: 设身处地为我想想。你是一名士兵，一名指挥官。广受尊敬，很重要。

original: Then, one day, you notice that you can't march as far as you used to. You can't spar as long. You start getting tired.
translation: 然后，有一天，你发现你不能像以前那样大步前进了，你不能战斗那么长时间了。你开始感到疲倦。

original: What would you do in my place? Would you let your legacy slip away? Would you die an old decrepit fossil? I wouldn't.
translation: 如果你是我，你会怎么做？你会让你的遗产溜走吗？你会变成老朽的化石死去吗？我不会。

original: So, yes, I started taking Buffout. It made me stronger. Better.
translation: 所以，是的，我开始服用壮大灵。它让我变得更强大，更好。

original: Then I came to my senses. I killed the drug runner who kept me supplied. I tried to move past it.
translation: 然后我恢复了理智，我杀死了给我供药的运毒者。我试着忘记这件事。

original: But I can't find a way out. My body craves something. I'm restless. I'm irritable.
translation: 但我找不到出路。我的身体渴望某种东西，我焦躁不安，我易怒。

original: I only want to serve Caesar as I once did.
translation: 我只想像以前那样为凯撒效力。

original: How did this start?
translation: 这是怎么开始的？

original: <Punch him in the nose, hard.>
translation: <狠狠地打他鼻子一拳>

original: <Punch him in the nose with your full strength.>
translation: <用尽浑身的力气打他的鼻子>

original: <Punch him in the nose with your full strength.>
translation: <用尽浑身的力气打他的鼻子>

original: Asshole.
translation: 混蛋。

original: Your commander asked me to do that.
translation: 你的指挥官让我这么做的。

original: Perhaps. I would not be so arrogant to delay your audience with Caesar. Conclude your business with him, and I would be willing to provide some.
translation: 也许吧。我不会傲慢到拖延你觐见凯撒的时间，如果你和他达成交易，我愿意提供一些。

original: I'm looking for work. Do you have any?
translation: 我在找工作，你有吗？

original: She knows her place.  There is a problem here at Base Camp that needs to be dealt with.
translation: 她知道自己的位置。大本营有个问题需要解决。

original: I'm looking for work. Iulia stated that you might be the person to talk to.
translation: 我正在找工作，尤利娅说你可能是合适的人选。

original: If Caesar trusts you, then so do I. There is a problem here at Base Camp that needs to be dealt with.
translation: 如果凯撒信任你，那我也信任你。大本营有个问题需要解决。

original: I'm looking for work. Do you have any?
translation: 我在找工作，你有吗？

original: There is an unknown malcontent spreading anti-Legion propaganda in this area. He leaves profligate graffiti on the road between Big Stop and the Fort.
translation: 有一个身份不明的不满者在这个地区传播反军团的宣传。他在大站和堡垒之间的路上肆意涂鸦。

original: What's the problem?
translation: 怎么了？

original: My superiors do not believe this to be an issue. The Fort and Base Camp are so far from the frontline that they do not even bother posting guards.
translation: 我的上级不认为这是个问题。堡垒和大本营离前线太远，他们甚至都懒得派卫兵。

original: They apparently cannot understand that if Caesar's will is affronted even the smallest bit, then the Legion is weakened.
translation: 他们显然无法理解，如果凯撒的意志受到哪怕是一点点的冒犯，那么军团就会被削弱。

original: Justice is justice, order is order, and the law is the law. We must enforce it even if it be inconvenient to us.
translation: 正义就是正义，秩序就是秩序，法律就是法律。即使对我们不方便，我们也必须执行。

original: How is that even possible? This place is swarming with Legionaries.
translation: 这怎么可能？这地方到处都是军团士兵。

original: They are found in the morning. Presumably, he comes at night.
translation: 他们是在早上被发现的，他大概是晚上弄的。

original: When does the graffiti appear?
translation: 涂鸦是什么时候出现的？

original: Absolutely absurd. The Burned Man does not exist, and any slave you hear mentioning otherwise should be reported at once.
translation: 绝对荒谬。火烧人根本不存在，如果你听到有任何奴隶提到这个，都应该立刻报告。

original: I've heard the slaves mention the Burned Man as being responsible.
translation: 我听奴隶们说火烧人是罪魁祸首。

original: *Sighs.* The Burned Man is allegedly the spirit of an arch-traitor who failed us in the First Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: *叹气*据说火烧人是第一次胡佛水坝战役中让我们失望的大叛徒的灵魂。.

original: He was punished accordingly and removed from existence.  His body was set alight, and his spirit was cast into the Grand Canyon.
translation: 他受到了相应的惩罚，从此不复存在。他的身体被点燃，他的灵魂被投进了大峡谷。

original: Both his body and his spirit have been destroyed. That is the penalty for failure in the Legion. Only a slave would admire such an obvious failure.
translation: 他的身体和灵魂都被摧毁了，这是在军团中失败的惩罚。只有奴隶才会欣赏如此明显的失败。

original: So, as you can see, the Burned Man cannot possibly exist.
translation: 所以，如你所见，火烧人不可能存在。

original: What is the Burned Man?
translation: 火烧人是什么？

original: Only a man would be so bold as you directly affront a Legionary, and even if a woman were of that boldness, we keep a close watch on all of them  in the area.
translation: 只有男人才会有你这样的胆量直接去冒犯一个军团士兵。不过即使一个女人有这样的胆量，我们也会密切监视这片区域的所有人。

original: Why are assuming a 'he?'
translation: 为什么假设是“他”？

original: I...meant no offense, truly.  But, you must understand that you are an anomaly, and unless you are leaving the graffiti, then the point still stands.
translation: 我...无意冒犯，真的。但是，你必须明白，你是一个异类，除非是你留下的涂鸦，否则这一点仍然有效。

original: Do you think that Caesar would give the Mark of Caesar to a woman if I were not bold?
translation: 如果我不大胆，你认为凯撒会给一个女人徽记吗？

original: I...see. If Caesar has a reason for this, then I suppose the matter is settled.
translation: 我...明白了。如果凯撒有理由这么做，那我想事情就解决了。

original: <Lie.> I am. I do it in the service of Caesar.
translation: <说谎>是我，我这么做是为了凯撒。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: Well, I'm not responsbile, so I guess I better start looking for who is.
translation: 好吧，这不关我的事，我想我最好开始找找该谁来负责了。

original: Perhaps, that would be best.
translation: 也许这样最好。

original: Well, I'll keep on the lookout for bold women, just in case.
translation: 以防万一，我会继续留意那些大胆的女人。

original: Newt provides us useful resources. Men for the war. Women for the labor. Food for the soldiers.
translation: 纽特为我们提供了有用的资源。参加战争的人，妇女的劳动，士兵们的食物。

original: I am concerned that Caesar will punish me for taking action. Perhaps, the need for order does not outweigh the need for resources.
translation: 我担心凯撒会因为我的行动而惩罚我。也许，对秩序的需求并没有超过对资源的需求。

original: Is there a particular reason that the Legion doesn't just collectively punish Newt?
translation: 军团没有集体惩罚纽特有什么特别的原因吗？

original: [SUCCEEDED] You are right. I am only ashamed that I did not see it before.
translation: [成功]你说得对。我只是感到惭愧，我以前没有看到这一点。

original: I shall decimate the town of Newt as the legate would do. And if the vandalism continues, the entire town will be destroyed.
translation: 我要像特使那样毁灭纽特镇。如果破坏行为继续下去，整个城镇都会被摧毁。

original: Take this as a reward.
translation: 把这个当作报酬吧。

original: Caesar will only reward success. And you know that this is the quickest path to success.
translation: 凯撒只会奖励成功，你知道这是通往成功的捷径。

original: [FAILED] You are not even a Liberti. You are a Dissolute, an outsider, even if you bear the Mark of Caesar.
translation: [失败]你甚至不是个自由民。你是个浪荡子，是个外来者，即使你身上有凯撒的徽记。

original: You know nothing of the Legion's needs.
translation: 你对军团的需求一无所知。

original: Get back to looking for the vandal.
translation: 回去找那个破坏者吧。

original: I'm sure Caesar won't mind.
translation: 我相信凯撒不会介意的。

original: Of course I am. Now, get back to work.
translation: 我当然是。现在，回去工作吧。

original: You're probably right.
translation: 你可能是对的。

original: Could you tell me about yourself?
translation: 你能介绍一下你自己吗？

original: I will not waste Caesar's time by speaking of my own unimportant life. Complete your business with him.
translation: 我不会浪费恺撒的时间来谈论我自己不重要的生活。完成你和他的业务。

original: Could you tell me about yourself?
translation: 你能介绍一下你自己吗？

original: Very well. What do wish to know?
translation: 很好。你想知道什么？

original: Could you tell me about yourself?
translation: 你能介绍一下你自己吗？

original: Since I was born.
translation: 从我出生起。

original: However, if you asking how long I have worn the uniform, then I became a soldier at the age of 12, and have been in Caesar's service for eight years.
translation: 然而，如果你问我穿这身军服多久了，那么我是在12岁时成为一名士兵的，已经为凯撒服务了8年。

original: How long have you been in the Legion?
translation: 你加入军团多久了？

original: Wherever Caesar has demanded. I have seen service against the Tall Pines and the First Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: 凯撒要求的任何地方。我见证了对高松战役和第一次胡佛水坝战役。

original: Where have you fought?
translation: 你在哪里打过仗？

original: You're unusually curious for a Dissolute. Which campaigns would you like to know about?
translation: 作为一个浪荡子，你的好奇心很不寻常。你想了解哪些战役？

original: Could you tell me a little about those campaigns?
translation: 你能告诉我一些关于这些战役的情况吗？

original: Very well. Which ones do you need a reminder of?
translation: 很好。哪些是需要提醒的？

original: Could you tell me about the campaigns again?
translation: 你能再给我讲讲这些战役吗？

original: A treacherous tribe that operated in this area. They traded with all like whores, caring not who they did business with.
translation: 一个在这一带活动的奸诈部落。他们像妓女一样和所有人交易，不在乎和谁做生意。

original: Since put to the cross, and expunged from this area.
translation: 自从上了十字架，就从这片区域被抹去了。

original: The Tall Pines.
translation: 高松战役。

original: A Legion victory. It forced the NCR to confront us as a major power and set the stage for a climactic battle in which justice will prevail.
translation: 军团的胜利。它迫使NCR以一个大国的身份与我们对峙，并为一场正义必胜的高潮战斗奠定了基础。

original: The First Battle of Hoover Dam.
translation: 第一次胡佛水坝战役。

original: Only in the sense that they held the dam, but they were too weak to pursue, and they are too weak to hold it now
translation: 只是在某种意义上，他们守住了大坝，但他们太弱了，无法追击。现在他们还是太弱，守不住大坝的。

original: When Lanius is ready, we shall march on the dam and Vegas.
translation: 等拉尼厄斯准备好了，我们就向大坝和维加斯进发。

original: Didn't the NCR win that battle?
translation: NCR不是赢了吗？

original: If you did not possess the Mark of Caesar, your head would be severed from your shoulders. Watch your tongue.
translation: 如果你没有凯撒的徽记，你的头就会从肩膀上被砍下来。说话注意点。

original: That is absolute bullshit. You can't just describe a clear loss as a victory.
translation: 这绝对是胡扯。你不能把一场明显的失败说成是胜利。

original: I do. And so does Caesar. And soon, we will not have to say it. Everyone will know it.
translation: 我知道，凯撒也一样。很快，我们就不用再说了，每个人都会知道。

original: If you say so.
translation: 既然你这么说。

original: Very well.
translation: 那好吧。

original: That's all.
translation: 够了。

original: By Mars, where did you find this?
translation: 玛尔斯在上，你在哪儿找到的？

original: Yes, I have. Here's proof.
translation: 是的，我有。这就是证据。

original: Oh? And who did you extract this from?
translation: 噢？你从谁那里弄来的？

original: Yes, I have. I secured a confession.
translation: 是的，我有。我让他招供了。

original: Then, get back to work. Or do you have questions?
translation: 那回去工作。还是有什么问题？

original: No, I haven't.
translation: 不，没有。

original: Ah. I suspected as much. His mother will be crucified under lex talionis, and he himself will need honest discipline in Caesar's service.
translation: 啊，我也是这么怀疑的。他的母亲将遵循塔利奥尼斯法被钉死在十字架上，而他自己也需要在为凯撒的服务中受到诚实的约束。

original: Here is your reward.
translation: 这是你的报酬。

original: There is a child in Newt, named Pablo. He was responsible.
translation: 纽特有个孩子，叫巴勃罗。他得为此负责。

original: No trader would be stupid enough to undermine Caesar, who gave him stable roads and honest labor. Though, they are of the Reservation....
translation: 没有哪个商人会愚蠢到去挖凯撒墙角，因为凯撒给了他稳定的道路和诚实的劳动。虽然，他们是保留...

original: <Lie.> It was one of the traders from the Reservation.
translation: <说谎>是一个来自保留地的商人。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You speak the truth. I cannot crucify them due to the Los Alamos Agreement.
translation: [成功]你说的是实话。根据洛斯阿拉莫斯协议，我不能把他们钉死在十字架上。

original: But I can expel them from the camp, let the Dolan Springs garrison deal with them.
translation: 但我可以把他们赶出营地，让多兰泉的驻军来处理。

original: Here is your reward.
translation: 这是你的报酬。

original: And if they are the Reservation, then they cannot possibly trusted.
translation: 如果他们是保留地的人，那就不可信。

original: [FAILED] Independent traders have assimilated themselves the best to the Legion justice.
translation: [失败]独立商人已经将自己融入了军团的正义之中。

original: Your judgement cannot be trusted. Our business is concluded.
translation: 你的判断不可信，我们的生意结束了。

original: Traders are always shifty.
translation: 商人总是很狡猾。

original: [SUCCEEDED] You speak the truth. I cannot crucify them due to the Los Alamos Agreement.
translation: [成功]你说的是实话。根据洛斯阿拉莫斯协议，我不能把他们钉死在十字架上。

original: But I can expel them from the camp, let the Dolan Springs garrison deal with them.
translation: 但我可以把他们赶出营地，让多兰泉的驻军来处理。

original: Here is your reward.
translation: 这是你的报酬。

original: And if they are the Reservation, then they cannot possibly trusted.
translation: 如果他们是保留地的人，那就不可信。

original: [FAILED] Independent traders have assimilated themselves the best to the Legion justice.
translation: [失败]独立商人已经将自己融入了军团的正义之中。

original: Your judgement cannot be trusted. Our business is concluded.
translation: 你的判断不可信，我们的生意结束了。

original: Traders are always shifty.
translation: 商人总是很狡猾。

original: Perhaps, he prioritizes returning to the city that made his career more than the dam.  A pity he is not Legion. He would make a fine Legate.
translation: 也许，比起大坝，他更想回到这座成就了他事业的城市。可惜他不是军团，他能成为一名出色的特使。

original: Why would Kimball want to retake Bullhead when the NCR can barely hold onto the Dam?
translation: 既然NCR几乎守不住大坝，那金博尔为什么还要夺回布尔海德？

original: A traitor Legionary in the heart of Legion control? Do you expect me to believe this?
translation: 军团控制中心的叛徒军团战士？你想让我相信这个吗？

original: <Lie.> It was Hunts Goats.
translation: <说谎]是“山羊”亨茨。

original: [SUCCEEDED] A bastardization of Legion principles. *Sigh.* He was a good Legionary, but he will have to be dealt with.
translation: [成功]军团原则的劣化。<叹气>他是一名优秀的军团士兵，但他必须被处理掉。

original: Here is your reward.
translation: 这是你的报酬。

original: I'm afraid Hunts Goats has relapsed into degeneracy. Believes that the graffiti is a work of beauty.
translation: 恐怕“山羊”亨茨又堕落了，认为涂鸦是一件美丽的作品。

original: [FAILED] It is not obvious to me. If you do not have any proof, then I will assume that you are lying or a fool.
translation: [失败]对我来说不是很明显。如果你没有任何证据，那么我就会认为你在说谎或是个傻子。

original: In that case, our business is over.
translation: 这样的话，我们的生意就结束了。

original: It is obvious that Hunts Goats is a secret Profligate spy.
translation: 显而易见，“山羊”亨茨是个秘密的浪荡子间谍。

original: [SUCCEEDED] A bastardization of Legion principles. <Sigh.> He was a good Legionary, but he will have to be dealt with.
translation: [成功]军团原则的劣化。<叹气>他是一名优秀的军团士兵，但他必须被处理掉。

original: Here is your reward.
translation: 这是你的报酬。

original: I'm afraid Hunts Goats has relapsed into degeneracy. Believes that the graffiti is a work of beauty.
translation: 恐怕“山羊”亨茨又堕落了，认为涂鸦是一件美丽的作品。

original: [FAILED] It is not obvious to me. If you do not have any further proof, then I will assume that you are lying or a fool.
translation: [失败]对我来说不是很明显。如果你没有任何进一步的证据，那么我就会认为你在说谎或是个傻子。

original: It is obvious that Hunts Goats is a secret Profligate spy.
translation: 显而易见，“山羊”亨茨是个秘密的浪荡子间谍。

original: Primus Station is one of the eyes of Caesar. Anything that approaches the Fort is monitored.
translation: 第一站是凯撒的眼睛之一，任何接近堡垒的东西都会被监控。

original: Be assured, anything that could threaten Caesar himself will be dealt with swiftly.
translation: 相信我，任何可能威胁到凯撒的事物都会被迅速处理。

original: What do you watch at the Primus Station?
translation: 你在第一站看守什么？

original: They look sort of like Bighorners, except they can climb mountains. You'll find them out in Colorado.
translation: 它们看起来有点像大角羊，只不过它们会爬山。你可以在科罗拉多找到它们。

original: What's a goat?
translation: 山羊是什么？

original: Before my transfer here, I was from a small community in southern Colorado.
translation: 在我转到这里之前，我来自科罗拉多州南部的一个小社区。

original: The Legion conscripted me to fight in their war against the Brotherhood out east.
translation: 军团征召我参加他们在东部对抗兄弟会的战争。

original: I'm amazed I survived. My superiors told me that it was the hardest battle they ever fought.
translation: 我很惊讶我能活下来。我的上级告诉我，这是他们经历过的最艰难的战斗。

original: Where are you from?
translation: 你来自哪里？

original: This is the first of four stations scattered around this region.
translation: 这是散布在这个地区的四个监测站中的第一个。

original: Are there other stations?
translation: 还有其他站点吗？

original: Not anymore.
translation: 不再有了。

original: There's Brotherhood out east?
translation: 东部有兄弟会？

original: They were called the Brotherhood of Steel. A strange tribe who wore powered armor and lived in bunkers.
translation: 他们被称为钢铁兄弟会。一个穿着动力盔甲，住在地堡里的奇怪部落。

original: The campaign was brutal, about three years long. Forced the Legion to use Stealth Boys to counter them. When we breached their bunker, they unleashed a deadly gas.
translation: 这场战役很残酷，持续了大约三年，迫使军团使用隐身小子来对抗他们。当我们突破他们的地堡时，他们释放了致命的毒气。

original: Took nearly a hundred Legionaries with them, at the tail-end of a campaign that killed thousands of us.
translation: 他们带走了近百名军团士兵，在一场战役中，我们数千人被杀。

original: I hear rumors that there's a chapter in the Mojave. I know the Centurions dread a repeat of that fight. And so do I.
translation: 我听说他们在莫哈维有一个分会。我知道百夫长害怕那场战争重演，我也是。

original: Tell me about the Brotherhood.
translation: 跟我说说兄弟会吧。

original: Ah, Finturus sent you. I'll tell you what I told him. The other Legionaries like them, and so do I.
translation: 啊，是芬图勒斯派你来的。我告诉你我跟他说过的话，其他军团士兵都喜欢，我也喜欢。

original: I'm looking for leads on who might be leaving graffiti.
translation: 我在找可能留下涂鸦的人的线索。

original: Beauty is to appreciated by Mars. It abates his desire for destruction to see works of art in his name.
translation: 美是玛尔斯所欣赏的。看到以他的名义创作的艺术品，他的毁灭欲望就会减弱。

original: A much-needed boon ahead of our march on Hoover Dam.
translation: 这是我们进军胡佛大坝之前急需的福音。

original: Plus, the other Legionaries think they're neat, and if Caesar doesn't care, neither do I.
translation: 另外，其他军团成员都觉得自己很干净，如果凯撒不在乎，我也不在乎。

original: But, it's anti-Legion graffiti.
translation: 但，这是反军团的涂鸦。

original: If you're dead-set on stopping the graffiti artist, you might try somewhere in Newt.
translation: 如果你执意要阻止这位涂鸦艺术家，你可以去纽特的某个地方试试。

original: I know Finturus has already grilled Flemus about it.
translation: 我知道芬图勒斯已经盘问过弗勒慕斯了。

original: So, no leads, then?
translation: 那，没有线索了？

original: If you're dead-set on stopping the graffiti artist, you might try somewhere in Newt.
translation: 如果你执意要阻止这位涂鸦艺术家，你可以去纽特的某个地方试试。

original: So, no leads, then?
translation: 那，没有线索了？

original: I was under the impression that Lucullus was sent to escort you. Return to him to find your way. We look forward to your service to us.
translation: 我记得卢库卢斯是被派来护送你的，回到他那里寻找你的路。我们期待你为我们服务。

original: I possess the Mark of Caesar. I am here to speak to your boss.
translation: 我有凯撒的徽记，我是来找你老板的。

original: I'm Pablo. I live here in Newt with my mom. She's one of the farmers. Maybe you've met her.
translation: 我是巴勃罗，我和我妈妈住在纽特。她是农民之一，也许你见过她。

original: Who are you?
translation: 你是谁？

original: Oh, I don't know how much I can help you, but I'll try.
translation: 噢，我不知道能帮到你多少，但我会尽力的。

original: I have questions.
translation: 我有问题。

original: I'm kind of sad right now, but if you want to know, then I'll tell you.
translation: 我现在有点难过，但如果你想知道，我会告诉你的。

original: I have questions.
translation: 我有问题。

original: I'm kind of sad right now, but if you want to know, then I'll tell you.
translation: 我现在有点难过，但如果你想知道，我会告诉你的。

original: I have questions.
translation: 我有问题。

original: Mostly, I help prepare fishing nets. We have to catch a lot of fish for the Legion.
translation: 大多数时候，我帮助准备渔网。我们得为军团抓很多鱼。

original: What do you do here?
translation: 你在这儿是做什么的？

original: They look funny, but everyone in town seems to be scared of them.
translation: 他们看起来很有趣，但镇上的每个人似乎都害怕他们。

original: What do you think of the Legion?
translation: 你对军团怎么看？

original: They look funny, but everyone in town seems to be scared of them. I can see why.
